ls-product.title: All-purpose Pan with Oven Mitts and Spoon

ls-product.title: Tri-ply 10 Piece Stainless Steel Cookware Set
ls-product.description: The stainless steel collection features a magnetic stainless exterior for use on conventional and induction ranges. The cooking surface is hand-polished 18/10 stainless steel that will not react with food. The inner core is pure aluminum from the base to the sides. The three layers are bonded together for optimum heat conductivity.All Clad's stainless collection features long, stay-cool handles, non-corrosive rivets, and sure-fitting lids, all made of stainless steel.All Clad stainless can be used with any type of utensils and is dishwasher safe.

ls-product.title: Breaking Bad: The Complete Series Blu-Ray
ls-product.description: After receiving a devastating cancer diagnosis and the staggeringly costly treatment plan that comes along with it, high school chemistry teacher Walter White (Bryan Cranston) puts his expertise to use by taking up an unorthodox new hobby: creating the perfect methamphetamine. When he develops a reputation for quality goods, Walter finds himself deeply immersed in the drug world, his part-time job having become a full-time preoccupation before he could truly understand the repercussions it would bring upon himself, his family, and his partner in crime Jesse Pinkman (Aaron Paul). This collection includes all five seasons of the groundbreaking television show from AMC.
ls-product.specification: NTSC. 16 discs. 2658 minutes.

ls-product.title: The Walking Dead: Seasons 1-3 Blu-Ray
ls-product.description: Based on Robert Kirkman's hugely successful comic book series, The Walking Dead is an epic, edge-of-your-seat drama where personal struggles are magnified against a zombie apocalypse. The series follows a group of survivors, led by police officer Rick Grimes (Andrew Lincoln) who are traveling in search of a safe and secure home. However, instead of the zombies, it is the humans who remain that truly become the walking dead.
ls-product.specification: NTSC. 11 discs. 1558 minutes. Includes T-shirt.

ls-product.title: AC401-2P Deluxe Movement and Sound Monitor
ls-product.description: The Angelcare movement and sound monitor deluxe plus offers both sound and movement monitoring in one device. With a range of up 820 feet and eight channels to minimize interference, the monitor offers continuous or voice activated sound transmission and will sound an alarm when no movement is detected for 20 seconds. For convenience, the monitor features a temperature display and sound and movement indicator lights. The deluxe plus system includes two parent units and two "under the mattress" sensor pads.
ls-product.specification: Under-the-Mattress Movement Sensor Pad. Full Color Digital Display. Temperature Display and Control (F°). Audio "Tic" Feature Portable & Rechargeable Parent Units. Nursery Night Light. Crystal Clear Transmission. operates on the 927 MHz and 2.4 GHz frequency bands. Out-of-Range Indicator – Up to 820 ft. (open field). Parent Unit Locator. Included with this package is an Instruction Manual, 2 Rechargeable Parent Units, 2 Charging Cradle, Nursery Unit, Sensor Pad, 3 AC Adapters, 8 AAA Rechargeable Batteries for Parent Unit, and a Power Cord Cover for Sensor Pad.

ls-product.title: Sound Monitor
ls-product.description: The AngelCare Baby Sound Monitor is designed to give you peace of mind. Trusted by millions of parents worldwide.
ls-product.specification: Voice activated or continuous transmission. Battery or AC adaptor operated. Sound lights to see and hear baby's sounds. 8 channels to minimize interference. Automatically converts to battery in case of power failure. Range: up to 250 meters/ 820 ft. NiCad batteries (included).

ls-product.title: BBC Natural History Collection Blu-Ray
ls-product.description: This is the ultimate Natural History collection, featuring the truly remarkable Planet Earth Special Edition, now with over 7 hours of extras, plus an additional three landmark series, all narrated by David Attenborough. In all, the collection features over 33 hours of programming on 18 discs, introducing thousands of species of plants and animals and including hours of special features that take you behind the scenes. Each critically acclaimed series reveals elements of the Earth and its unique creatures through stunning imagery and insightful commentary. Journey with the BBC and explore our vast and diverse world.
ls-product.specification: NTSC. 8 discs. 1350 minutes.

ls-product.title: Downton Abbey Seasons 1-4 Blu-Ray
ls-product.description: This set includes the first four seasons of this Golden Globe and multi-Emmy Award-winning series, bringing Downton Abbey from pre-war England through the storms of World War I and into the social upheaval of England in the 1920s as the lives of its inhabitants are shaped by romance and heartbreak, ambition and betrayal.

ls-product.title: Bellecour Custom Built Jewelry with Certificate of Authenticity and Value
ls-product.description: Create your own piece of unique jewelry; bracelet, ring, necklace, you decide! Based off of your taste and input, the expert jewelers at Bellecour will make your dream piece of jewelry into reality. With the information and images you provide them, you will be presented with a 3D mock-up for your approval. You are allowed to have this mock-up modified up to 3 times, providing your detailed feedback and requests between each mock-up to ensure the end result is 100% to satisfaction. Your requests will all be taken into consideration and the expert jeweler will guide you towards the fine stones and jewels available at the price of your redemption. Once the final mock-up is approved by you the crafting begins and your unique piece of jewelry will be delivered within 4 weeks accompanied by an independent GIA or EGL certification of materials used and product value.
ls-product.specification: 100% customer built. 3 mock-ups included with unlimited modification requests between each. GIA or EGL certificate of authenticity included. No cancellations or returns since this is custom built jewelry.

ls-product.title: $50 Gift Certificate
ls-product.description: Birks, one of North America’s most prestigious jewellers and trusted brands, has been Canada’s diamond and fine jewellery leader since 1879. Uncompromisingly beautiful, Birks offers you a choice as varied, unique and meaningful as each of life’s occasions. Come and discover our wonderful Canadian diamonds, engagement rings, wedding bands, fine jewellery, pearls, watches and gifts that are sure to delight. Enjoy this gift card online at MaisonBirks.com and at any of the 29 Birks stores across Canada. Easily rechargeable and reusable, the Birks Gift Card lets you keep and check your balance during purchases.
ls-product.specification: This gift certificate operates as a tender (after applicable taxes) on your purchase at Birks. No minimum purchase required. The Birks Gift Certificate must be surrendered for redemption. Not redeemable for cash. Will not be replaced if lost or stolen. Cannot be applied towards payment of account. Not valid towards telephone or Internet orders. The Birks Gift Certificates are redeemable at any Birks store in Canada.

ls-product.specification: Zone Touch Technology. Improved compact design for ultimate comfort. Full body rubber soft grip to prevent slipping. finger detail and contour attachments. Intelligent Tool - provides feedback to user. 3 position Zone Light. Accessory storage bag included.

ls-product.title: NEW GEN Smart Select Steam Mop
ls-product.description: Black & Decker NEW GEN Smart Select Steam Mop
ls-product.specification: Kills 99.9% of germs using just water. No chemicals required. Great for homes with kids or pets. With SmartSelect Technology, select the specific floor type – Wood/Tile/Stone Safe to use on sealed hardwood floors. Large removable water tank for convenient refilling.

ls-product.title: Auto-Leveling Laser
ls-product.description: The Black & Decker BDL170 Bullseye Auto-leveling Laser With AnglePro is ideal for hanging decorative items, shelving, pictures, and for angled applications, such as hanging items along a staircase.
ls-product.specification: Hands-free convenience. Projects horizontally or vertically.

ls-product.title: Portable Work Bench
ls-product.description: The lightweight Black & Decker WM225 portable work bench transforms into a sawhorse, a vise, and a bench tool stand capable of holding up to 450 pounds.
ls-product.specification: Heavy-gauge steel frame. Lightweight and portable.

ls-product.title: ASSAM Tea Press with Stainless Steel Filter
ls-product.description: This tea press uses the same system as coffee makers to allow for full control of the tea steeping process.
ls-product.specification: 1.5 litre capacity. Perfect for use with any loose leaf tea or tea bags. Stainless steel filter. Borosilicate glass body and handle.

ls-product.title: BISTRO Clear Electric Kettle
ls-product.description: The Bodum Bistro clear electric water kettle gives you cool style and the fun of watching your water boil. It's double walled with an inner wall of neutral borosilicate glass and an outer BPA-free plastic wall to add to insulation and durability.
ls-product.specification: Neutral borosilicate glass inner wall won't affect water flavour. BPA-free plastic outer wall. Double-wall keeps water hot longer.

ls-product.title: BISTRO Electric Blade Coffee Grinder
ls-product.description: To achieve the most flavour from coffee beans, you must grind them right before they come in contact with hot water. This is where the Bodum Bistro Blade Grinder comes in. From coarse to fine, you can can get the ideal grind for any method of brewing.
ls-product.specification: Cable can be conveniently stored inside the grinder at the bottom. Made from stainless steel, plastic, and rubber. The bistro grinder can also be used to grind spices. Strong, durable stainless steel cutting blade that spins at a precise RPM. Easy, push-button control allows for pulse action or continuous grind.

ls-product.title: BISTRO Electric Burr Coffee Grinder
ls-product.description: The colourful electric coffee grinder makes it easy to grind up a fresh pot every morning. Choose from over 14 settings, from coarse to fine, for the perfect java every time.
ls-product.specification: Adjustable grinding for easily determining coarseness. Static-free borosilicate glass container catches the grounds. Borosilicate glass container comes with a slip-proof silicone band for grip. Tight silicone/nylon lid for spill prevention. Grinder crushes beans between stainless steel conical burrs rather than slicing, preserving flavour and aroma. Push button, pre-set timer for easy, consistent results.

ls-product.title: BISTRO Electric Kettle
ls-product.description: This kettle is outfitted with a powerful heating element that boils water in about four minutes and saves energy at the same time. Anti-boil-dry technology automatically turns the kettle off when the water has boiled.
ls-product.specification: Made from BPA-free plastic and stainless steel. Easy manual on/off button on the handle. Easy-to-read water level indicator. Mesh-screened spout filters out chalk and other mineral impurities. Powerful heating element boils water in about four minutes. Pitcher can be secured to the base in any direction and removed for cordless pouring.

ls-product.title: CAFFETTIERA French Press Coffee Maker
ls-product.description: The Caffettiera french press coffee maker incorporates classic style and delicious aromatic coffee. It's the pure and simple way of making coffee and the method coffee tasters use to determine the quality of coffee beans.
ls-product.specification: Brews 12 ounces of coffee. Sturdy, chrome-plated steel frame; black plastic lid and handle; easy-to-clean glass carafe. Three-part stainless-steel press mechanism; replacement parts available. No paper filters needed. All parts are dishwasher safe.

ls-product.title: BISTRO Electric Hand Mixer
ls-product.description: Whip up the fluffiest whipped cream, mashed potatoes, and more with this electric hand mixer. It has three interchangeable attachments and a powerful five-speed mixing ability that's ready to take on your culinary creativity.
ls-product.specification: Five-speed hand mixer with 200-watt power. Interchangeable beater, dough hook and balloon whisk attachments. Rubberized exterior provides an easy grip. Two-year manufacturer's limited warranty included.

ls-product.title: BISTRO Electric Stand Mixer
ls-product.description: This stand mixer features a power 700-watt, seven-speed motor that gives you more than enough oomph to handle your mixing tasks. The large-capacity, stainless steel bowls come with rubber-covered handle for easy pouring, and the compact design takes up less space on your counter or in your cabinet.
ls-product.specification: 4.7L (160oz) stainless steel mixing bowl. Non-stick coated dough hook. Beater. Whisk attachments.

ls-product.title: BISTRO 1.5 Litre Stand Blender
ls-product.description: Make icy drinks and delicious meals quickly via the 500 watt motor with the power to crush, grind, chop, mix and liquefy. The easy, adjustable dial and dual-spout lid make it easy.
ls-product.specification: 500 watt motor. Light, shatter-resistant 1.2L jug made from BPA-free Eastman Tritan. Rubber handle for a safe grip. Lid with two separate pour spouts. Adjustable continuous speed dial and pulse function. Suction cups on the base for a secure. Jug and lid are dishwasher safe.

ls-product.title: BISTRO Toaster
ls-product.description: Stylish and efficient, this two-slice toaster features a variable-browning button for the perfect slice, plus a defrost feature and a built-in pop-up warming rack for bread, bagels, muffins, and more.
ls-product.specification: Variable browning and temperature settings plus defrost and cancel buttons. Adjustable grates for a secure grip around food. Built-in, pop-up warming rack. Removable crumb tray for easy cleaning. Footed base with cord retainer to adjust cord length and store neatly.

ls-product.title: VPower V-Slicer Mandoline
ls-product.description: Add creativity and style to your meal with the Swissmar Börner V Power mandoline. It includes three inserts for ten different cuts: a 7mm blade, 3-1/2mm blade, and a thick/thin insert for meat, allowing the V Power to julienne, shred, cube, and create French fries. A patented push-button adjustment allows you to change the size or thickness of the cut without removing the insert. The blades are made from surgical-grade stainless steel and they cut from both angles. The plane has a safety position covering the V-blade when not in use. The frame is made from tough ABS plastic with slip-resistant rubber feet. An ambidextrous food safety holder requires little pressure and holds the food in place with prongs to guard your hands from the blades. The set also includes an insert holder that doubles as a drying rack. Instruction manual included.
ls-product.specification: Three inserts for ten different cuts. 7mm blade, 3-1/2mm blade, & thick/thin insert. Push-button adjustment. Surgical-grade stainless steel. Tough ABS plastic.

ls-product.title: Eau de Parfum for Women
ls-product.description: Boucheron by Boucheron. Eau de Parfum.
ls-product.specification: 100ml Eau de Parfum Spray.

ls-product.title: Eau de Toilette for Women
ls-product.description: Boucheron by Boucheron. Eau de Toilette.
ls-product.specification: 100ml Eau de Toilette Spray.

ls-product.title: Jaipur Bracelet for Women
ls-product.description: Jaipur Bracelet by Boucheron. Eau de Parfum.
ls-product.specification: 100ml Eau de Parfum Spray.

ls-product.title: Place Vendome for Women
ls-product.description: Place Vendome by Boucheron. Eau de Parfum.
ls-product.specification: 100ml Eau de Parfum Spray.

ls-product.specification: 100ml Eau de Parfum Spray.

ls-product.title: Jaipur for Men
ls-product.description: Jaipur by Boucheron. Eau de Parfum.
ls-product.specification: 100ml Eau de Parfum Spray.

ls-product.title: 230g Conical Burr Grinder
ls-product.description: Burr grinder delivers a precise and even grind for any type of coffee beverage from espresso to french. The perfect alternative to imprecise blade grinders. Generates minimal heat to the coffee bean to minimize flavor loss.
ls-product.specification: 230 grams of beans capacity. 500 rpm. 10 grind size settings. Stainless steel casing.

ls-product.title: Barista Express 15 Bar Espresso Maker
ls-product.description: The Barista Express, with its integrated conical burr grinder and dosing control, helps deliver the optimum path for beans to espresso in under a minute, ensuring a smooth and thick créma. The measured dose is delivered straight into the coffee filter to maximize luscious créma with every extraction.
ls-product.specification: 15 Bar Italian thermoblock pump. Sealed bean hopper (8oz). Integrated conical burr grinder. Removable 2 litre water tank. Auto-Purge™ function. 360° swivel action steam wand. Programmable / manual settings. 1450 watt motor. Included : Single and dual wall filters. Stainless steel frothing jug. Cleaning tools.

ls-product.title: The IQ Kettle
ls-product.description: Five settings brew at the exact temperatures for green, white, oolong and black teas.The Hold Temp button keeps the kettle at temperature for 20 minutes – ready for that second cup. Clear water-level indicators on both sides and 360° stainless steel directional base for added convenience.
ls-product.specification: 2 qt (1.8 L). Multi-directional cord-free power base with power cord storage. Removable scale filter. Five pre-set brewing temperatures. Safety boil dry protection.

ls-product.title: The IQ Kettle Pure
ls-product.description: The kettle that knows the ideal temperature for tea and coffee, with a soft open lid. Easy to see. Easy to clean.
ls-product.specification: 1.7 litre. Slow lid release. 5 temperature settings. Holds the temperature of the heated water for 20 minutes. Cushion controlled lid prevents splash back. With boil dry protection. 110 - 120 Volts. 1500 watts.

ls-product.title: Crystal Clear Electric Glass Kettle
ls-product.description: Breville BKE595XL Crystal Clear Electric Glass Kettle A clean taste starts with clean water. How do you ensure a more pure boil? With the natural purity of glass -- easy to see, easy to clean. The Crystal Clear has a large capacity cordless jug made of German SCHOTT glass. Its high power 1800 watts means faster boiling. Ease of mind matches ease of use -- everything touching water is BPA free; the wide, soft-opening lid prevents splashes and the safety auto shut-off prevents boil-off. So simply elegant, you may want to watch water boil.
ls-product.specification: Capacity: 7 Cup / 1.7 Liter / 57oz. German SCHOTT glass jug. Slow Release Lid. Safety Auto Shut-Off. Boil Dry Protection. 360 multi-directional base. Removable scale filter. Ergonomic handle. 1800-watt.

ls-product.title: The Soft Top kettle
ls-product.description: Cordless convenience in a fast-boiling kettle complements the modern kitchen. 1500 watt heating element with a high-capacity (up to 54 fl oz) vertical-design heats quickly. Auto-off tracks the internal temperature and shuts the kettle off when it reaches a boil. Pleasant chimes alert you to the completion of a heating cycle.
ls-product.specification: 1.8 qt (1,7 L). Base pivotante 360° sans fil. Filtration amovible.

ls-product.title: Cafe Roma 15 Bar Espresso Maker
ls-product.description: Thermoblock heating system extracts espresso at the perfect temperature. A full 15 bars of pressure maximizes crema for a rich, barista-style aroma and taste. Effortless frothing and foaming.
ls-product.specification: 15 Bar Italian thermoblock pump. Removable 1.2 litre water tank. Stainless steel housing. 1000 watt motor. Included : Single, double or pods espresso shots. Stainless steel frothing pitcher. Tamping tool and measuring spoon. Two espresso cups with saucers. Cleaning tool.

ls-product.title: Cafe Venezia Espresso Machine
ls-product.description: Café Venezia Espresso Machine offers temperature control through its auto purge feature and provides the appropriate pressure through its 15 bar Italian pump, all in a compact stainless steel design. But more than that, you'll find dual wall filters to assist in the creation of a thicker, richer crema.
ls-product.specification: 15 bar Italian pump. Thermocoil heating system. Auto purge function for optimal coffee extraction. Advanced dual wall crema system filters (1 & 2 cup) Back fill 2.75 litre removable water tank. On-board storage for tools and accessories. 1200 Watts. Included: Stainless steel jug. 50mm portafilter. Tamper/measuring spoon.

ls-product.title: Duo-Temp 15 Bar Espresso Maker
ls-product.description: A café in your kitchen. A die-cast metal body and full 4.5" (11.4 cm) clearance accommodates larger cups – ideal for espresso variations like Americano, cappuccino and café latte. Prior to extraction, the unique 15 bar Triple-Prime™ pump automatically releases three bursts of hot water into the filter head, causing the ground coffee or espresso pod to expand. The increased pressure, allowing the machine to extract more créma, gives the coffee a rich, smooth taste.
ls-product.specification: 15 Bar Italian thermoblock triple priming pump. Stainless-steel housing. Removable 2.2 litre water tank. 360° swivel action steam wand. 1000 watt motor. Included : 1 cup & 2 cup dual-wall stainless steel filters. Tamping tool/measuring spoon. Stainless steel frothing pitcher. Cleaning tool.

ls-product.title: The Crispy Crust Pizza Oven
ls-product.description: Top and bottom heating elements heat the oven stone to a high of 660°, replicating the cooking environment of a brick oven. Choose from thin, medium or thick pizza dough settings to suite your preferred style. Viewing window allows you to monitor cooking progress without the need of opening the top lid.
ls-product.specification: 12 inch pizza capacity cooks a pizza in as little as 8 minutes. 12 inch pizza capacity. Pre-Heat, Thin, Medium, Thick, Low & Keep Warm temperature settings. Included: Removable 12” pizza stone that absorbs moisture and distributes heat evenly for a crispy crust

ls-product.title: Infuser 15 Bar Espresso Maker
ls-product.description: Rather than start with bursts of high pressure, a steady, low-pressure pre-infusion gently expands the grinds before stepping up to high pressure for an even extraction. PID temperature control delivers increased temperature stability for a better tasting coffee and high power 1700W for high pressure steam and faster heat up.
ls-product.specification: 15 Bar Italian pump. Removable 1.8 litre water tank. Auto-Purge™ function. Electronic PID temperature control. 360° swivel action steam wand. 1700 watt motor. Included : Single & dual wall filter baskets (4). Coffee scoop. Stainless steel frothing jug. Cleaning disc & tablets. Cleaning tool & allen key. Water filter & holder.

ls-product.title: The Tea Maker
ls-product.description: The new Breville Tea Maker is a revolutionary tea experience. Fully programmable for all types of tea, water temperatures, and steep times. The moving tea basket allows water to circulate freely around the individual tea leaves for maximum infusion. Set the timer and wake up to the aroma of your favorite brew. The German-made Schott glass kettle is durable and stain resistant.
ls-product.specification: 51 oz (1.5 L). Tea Basket Cycle auto lowers & lifts tea to brew Auto Start begins brew at pre-selected time Variable Tea Strength controls steeping time Variable Temperature for all tea varietals Accurate Temperature Sensor with real-time display Time Since Brew LCD monitors freshness 60 Minute Keep Warm function

ls-product.title: The Duo-Temp Pro Espresso Maker
ls-product.description: The Duo-Temp Pro automatically cools the heating system by purging cold water through for optimal coffee extraction. The low pressure pre-infusion gradually increases water pressure at the start of the extraction before applying higher pressure for an even extraction. PID temperature control increases temperature stability during the extraction for balanced flavors in the cup.
ls-product.specification: 15 Bar Italian Pump. 1600W thermocoil. Integrated stainless steel water coil accurately controls water temperature. Electronic PID temperature control for increased temperature stability. 61 fl.oz (1.8L) removable rear-mounted water tank with integrated water filtration. 1600W. Included: 54mm stainless steel portafilter with commercial style spouts. Integrated removable tamper. 16 fl.oz (480ml) stainless steel milk jug. Water filter holder & replaceable water filter to reduce impurities and scale build-up.

ls-product.title: The Dual Boiler Espresso Maker
ls-product.description: Espresso perfection, requires precision temperature and pressure control, consistently, every time. At the heart of this machine is its Dual Stainless Steel Boiler heating system. The brew boiler, for the espresso shot, extracts to within +/- 1'C and a separate steam boiler, which offers instant and powerful steam on demand. So you can extract your shot, at the right temperature, delivering optimal flavour and steam your milk to cafe quality, at the same time.
ls-product.specification: 15 Bar Italian pump with low pressure pre-infusion and regulated maximum extraction pressure. Timer. Shot Clock and Programmable Auto Start. PID controlled Dual Boiler with Actively Heated Group Head. 58mm single and dual wall filters. Both in single and double shot sizes. Water Tank Capacity. 2.5 litre. With an easy top fill lid. Water filters, 750ml stainless steel jug, cleaning disc and tablets, cleaning tools. Stainless Steel.

ls-product.title: The Oracle Espresso Maker
ls-product.description: The Oracle is the world’s first automatic manual espresso machine that brings true café quality to your home without the barista. The Oracle™ has automatic grinding, dosing, tamping and milk texturing, automating the two most difficult parts of manual espresso.
ls-product.specification: Pump Pressure. Timer. Heating System. Pre Infusion Function. Water Tank Capacity: 2.5L. Onboard Storage.

ls-product.title: Milk Café 750ml Milk Frother
ls-product.description: Hot milk drinks are best when made with the smallest bubbles. Rather than a bubble bath, it's that creamy consistency that creates a rich hot chocolate or a smooth latte or cappuccino. The Milk Café uses induction heating and spinning to make those small bubbles. Simply choose the appropriate frothing disc — latte for a creamy result, the cappuccino disc for more froth — fill with enough milk for one or up to three cups, select your temperature, and start.
ls-product.specification: 750 ml capacity. 3 settings. Stainless steel. Dishwasher safe. Boil dry/Overheat protection. Included : Latte Frothing Disc. Cappuccino Frothing Disc.

ls-product.title: The Smart Grinder Pro
ls-product.description: Automatically doses the same amount every time you grind. Breville's conical burr Smart Grinder uses Dosing IQ technology to automatically adjust the dose whenever you change the grind. You can even tweak for taste.The Smart GrinderPro still has an LCD display, 450g removable hopper, and comes with two grinding cradles for dosing directly into 50-54mm or 58mm commercial espresso filters. In addition, there's an air-tight storage canister, suitable for plunger or filter coffee.
ls-product.specification: Stainless steel conical burr grinder. 60 grind settings. Dose automatically adjusts as you tweak your grind size. Hands free dosing directly to your chosen filter and handle. Dose adjusts for number of shots or cups selected. Removable storage hopper included. 165 Watts Included: 2 Porta-filter cradles suitable for 50-54mm filters and 58mm commercial filters Air tight grinds container. Cleaning brush.

ls-product.title: 7-Quart Slow Cooker with Easysear
ls-product.description: Slow cook meats and stews to perfection. Sear, sauté, and brown on the stove-top and finish slow without losing any depth of flavor or nutrients. Low setting for gentle, uniform heat to deepen rich flavors. High and Combo settings for better cuts of meat and dishes featuring vegetables and grains such as soups and stews. Cool-touch handles let you easily transfer from stove to cooker.
ls-product.specification: 7 qt (6.6 L) capacity. One-pot cooking. EasySear™ stovetop insert. Wrap-around heating element. Scratch resistant vessel. Oven safe. Included : Stainless Steel Roasting Rack.

ls-product.title: Digital Food Steamer
ls-product.description: Three large trays for steaming different dishes at the same time – from rice to vegetables to fish. Easily refill the reservoir while in use. Boil Dry Protection prevents overheating when water runs out. Automatic Timer and Keep Warm function gets food tender and keeps it ready.
ls-product.specification: Preset 20 minutes. Customize up to two hours. Delay start for up to 12 hours. 3 stackable steam trays with removable bases. Keep warm function. Water level and top up indicator with pull out spout. Included: Rice/Sauce cooking bowl. Food divider. Integrated egg holders.

ls-product.title: Custom Loaf Bread Maker
ls-product.description: There's nothing like waking up to a freshly baked loaf of bread. But when there are over 60 different recipes to choose from, how do you make sure you get it right? A very clever interface computes temperature and baking time when you make a selection, while a super easy Turn and Confirm dial gets you started on any recipe in seconds. It even lets you select what time you want the bread to be ready, adds fruits and nuts at the appropriate time, and lets you create your own recipes.
ls-product.specification: Loaf sizes 1.0 lb to 2.5 lb (Family size). 13 Automatic Settings with 3 crust color options. Custom settings. 'Pause' function. 13-hour delay start timer. Sound alert. Viewing light. 46 step-by-step recipes. Included : Collapsible paddle for bread and dough settings. Fixed paddle for 'Jam' only.

ls-product.title: Fast Slow Cooker and Kitchen Tool Set
ls-product.description: Do you have all the time in the world, or no time at all? This 6 Quart Pressure Cooker & Slow Cooker keeps pace with you. One appliance that does both: tender meat in minutes using pressure, or flavor layering up to 8 hours when slow cooking. Sauté and sear onions and meats directly in the cooking bowl. Pressure steam vegetables, poultry or seafood in minutes. Layer delicate flavors over many hours for succulent, melt-in-the mouth meals, or achieve the same results in no time when you're under pressure. Fully programmable, with integrated safety features so you can set and forget, the Fast Slow Cooker's 6 Quart capacity is perfect for when friends drop in for dinner. Slow food in the fast lane. Inludes a 5 pieces nylon kitchen tool set that is heat-resistant up to 240°C/464°F and dishwasher safe.
ls-product.specification: Cook on low, medium or high. Slow cook for up to 8 hours. Safety locking lid. Safety valve. Pressure release button. Stainless steel construction. 3-way safety system. Included accessories : Stainless steel steaming tray and trivet. Heat resistant spatula. Serving spoon. Measuring cup. Kitchen Tool Set : Perforated turner. Spaghetti server. Slotted spoon. Cooking spoon. Ladle.

ls-product.title: Fast Slow Cooker
ls-product.description: Do you have all the time in the world, or no time at all? This 6 Quart Pressure Cooker & Slow Cooker keeps pace with you. One appliance that does both: tender meat in minutes using pressure, or flavor layering up to 8 hours when slow cooking. Sauté and sear onions and meats directly in the cooking bowl. Pressure steam vegetables, poultry or seafood in minutes. Layer delicate flavors over many hours for succulent, melt-in-the mouth meals, or achieve the same results in no time when you're under pressure. Fully programmable, with integrated safety features so you can set and forget, the Fast Slow Cooker's 6 Quart capacity is perfect for when friends drop in for dinner. Slow food in the fast lane.
ls-product.specification: Cook on low, medium or high. Slow cook for up to 8 hours. Safety locking lid. Safety valve. Pressure release button. Stainless steel construction. 3-way safety system. Included accessories : Stainless steel steaming tray and trivet. Heat resistant spatula. Serving spoon. Measuring cup.

ls-product.title: Smart Waffle Maker 4 Square
ls-product.description: 4 slice waffle maker with Waffle IQ automatically calculates cooking time and colour selection. Choose from five presets: Belgium, Classic, Chocolate, Buttermilk and custom mode. Thermal Pro Premium PFOA-free non-stick cast aluminum heating plates prevents waffles from sticking and ensures even heat distribution. 12 customizable browning settings. Wide wrap around moat catches and cooks batter overflow. Timer counts down once lid is closed and resets the time for next batch. LCD changes from blue to orange to indicate it is cooking. Features A Bit More button. Locking latch for storage, includes a BPA free dosing cup.
ls-product.specification: Menu dial has options for four different batter types. Control dial has 12 settings. Smart technology automatically self-adjusts time and temperature. Breville's patented "A Bit More" for extra browning. Die-cast aluminum cooking plates. No-mess moat.

ls-product.title: The Smart Grill 1800 Watt Grill
ls-product.description: Breville designers re-envisioned the craft of indoor grilling. Dishwasher safe plates embedded with smart heating elements inspire pitch-perfect results. Top quality non-stick indoor grill with six height settings and integrated drip tray. Adjust the height to avoid crushing food or open it all the way up in 180° barbecue mode.Temperature responsive LCD display colorfully alerts when the grill is ready to go. Tilt the bottom plate to drain fats in the easy-to-handle drip tray.The grill unfolds flat to provide a large cooking surface.
ls-product.specification: Removable plates with fully imbedded cooking elements. Includes 1 flat non-stick removable plate and 1 ribbed non-stick removable plate. Temperature responsive LCD display colorfully alerts when the grill is ready to go. Floating hinge to maintain even pressure on both thick or thin items. Adjustable height settings to avoid crushing food. Removable drip tray. Dishwasher safe drip tray, removable dishwasher safe, non stick plates.

ls-product.title: The Quick Clean 800 Watt Grill
ls-product.description: The top plate can be adjusted to six pre-set heights. On the lower settings, this unique patented feature reduces the weight pressing upon more delicate foods like fish or vegetables. The higher settings are ideal for making open melt sandwiches or reheating. The removable non-stick plates firmly lock into place and are removed with the touch of a button.
ls-product.specification: Included: Une plaque amovible nervurée. Une plaque amovible lisse. Six différents réglages de hauteur.

ls-product.title: Panini Grill
ls-product.description: Use the Panini Grill for a savory smoked chicken panini with crispy pancetta, or for sweet treats like mascarpone and amaretti. With the adjustable height control, you can grill delicate ingredients such as fish and hamburger buns without squashing. The ribbed, non-stick cooking plates offer a 115-square-inch cooking surface to accommodate steaks and Artisan breads. And the extendable feet can be flipped forward to level the bottom cooking plate, or flipped backwards to angle the bottom plate and drain the maximum amount of fat while cooking.
ls-product.specification: Ribbed top and bottom plates. Premium non-stick coating. Stainless steel housing. 7 adjustable height control settings. 115 square inches surface. 1500 watt element. Dishwasher safe.

ls-product.title: Panini Quattro Grill
ls-product.description: Café-style paninis in your own kitchen – transform ordinary sandwichesinto gourmet delights. The flat cooking plates ensure that paninis are evenly browned, and they're versatile enough to cook eggs and pancakes.Floating top plate evenly toasts thick artisan breads. The adjustableheight control makes delicious, open-faced sandwich melts.
ls-product.specification: Flat top and bottom plate for more even cooking. Floating hinge to maintain even pressure on both thick or thin items. The top plate can be moved into a range of positions above the bottom plate. Integrated On/Off ‘Power’ and ‘Ready’ lights. Adjustable height control. Locking storage clip. Cord wrap. Non-slip feet.

ls-product.title: Hot Wok
ls-product.description: Searing high-wall heat wok that works just like a traditional iron wok on a gas range. Butterfly Heating element evenly distributes heat up the high wall to 425°F (218°C), bringing real Asian flare to the at-home kitchen. Not limited to Asian stir-fry, 15 heat settings can be used for all kinds of meals, including pasta, soups, curries, or scrambled eggs. The dishwasher safe, durable Quantanium non-stick finish of the wok bowl needs less oil to cook and can be wiped down for convenient clean-up.
ls-product.specification: 1500W butterfly heating element heats up to 425ºF. 15 precision heat settings. 6 Quart capacity/14" diameter (family size). Removable temperature control probe. Cook 'n' Look lid. Dishwasher safe bowl and lid.

ls-product.title: Hot Wok Pro
ls-product.description: This 8-quart (7.5L) high-heat wok with stainless steel base has a powerful 1800 watt element that distributes heat up the walls of the wok. The thick aluminium layers maintain the high heat necessary for crisp stir fries. The 15 precision heat settings, up to a searing 425°F (218°C), emulate authentic Asian style gas cooking. So now you can capture the crispness when you're not cooking with gas.
ls-product.specification: 8 quart (7.5L). PFOA-free non-stick coating. Stainless steel base with quick release button. 15 precision heat settings, up to a searing 425°F (218°C). Included: Spatula. Steam rack.

ls-product.title: Panini Duo
ls-product.description: In Australia, a panini is called a Breville. Find out why. Even heat distribution and adjustable height for authentic café-style grilled paninis.
ls-product.specification: Ribbed non-stick top plate Flat non-stick bottom plate Brushed stainless-steel housing Adjustable height control 11.5'' x 8.5'' cooking surface 1500 watt element

ls-product.title: Risotto Plus
ls-product.description: The combination cooker that makes tender slow cooked meals, stir-free risotto, and fluffy rice all in the same bowl. Rice can be fluffy when steamed, creamy in a risotto, or spicy when in a slow cooked meal. This variety definitely makes weekly meals more interesting. But how can you make white rice, an authentic risotto or even a slow cooked meal in one appliance. The Risotto Plus is an advanced multi-cooker that can make tender slow-cooked meals, stir-free risotto, fluffy rice and quinoa all in the same cooking bowl. Also with a saute setting that allows you to caramelize all your lovely fresh ingredients.
ls-product.specification: Risotto making function creates authentic risottos. Advanced multi-cooker. Saute setting. Aluminum nonstick bowl. Removable cord.

ls-product.title: Smart Fryer
ls-product.description: Breville 1500-watt Smart Fryer lets you easily make French fries, mini doughnuts, tempura and more. It adjusts the time and temperature and features seven presets, a digital timer and a large viewing window to check out the deliciousness.
ls-product.specification: Adjusts time and temperature to suit what you're cooking. Digital timer with seven presets. Fresh/frozen feature automatically changes the time and temperature of your cooking based on the selected mode. Four-litre oil capacity. CoolZone technology keeps debris in cooler oil, keeping burning to a minimum and extending oil life. Cool-touch handles. Non-slip feet. Cord storage.

ls-product.title: All in One Anti-Suction Blending
ls-product.description: Smooth blending. Variable mashing. Even chopping. Adjustable slicing.The All in One Anti Suction Blending allows you to keep control over your immersion blender rather than it having control over you. The Adjustable Slicing Disc has 18 thickness settings so you can customize the thickness of your slices from 0.5mm thin up to 6.0mm thick. Select the texture of your mash with the Variable Mashing Leg, simply twist the adjustable head for fine, medium or coarse mashing texture. Cut through tasks in half the time using the S Blade without over processing.
ls-product.specification: 15 speed settings. Antisuction Blending Technology. Ergonomic Control Grip. Ice Crushing Blades. Dishwasher safe parts. 110 - 120 Volts. 280W. Includes: 1.6L food processing bowl with Reversible Shredding Disc. Whisk attachment. Stainless steel immersion blender.

ls-product.title: Freeze and Mix Ice Cream Bowl
ls-product.description: Whip up ice cream, gelato and frozen yogurt in as little as 20 minutes.Simply pre-freeze the bowl, add the ingredients, and the innovative scraper paddle does the rest. It scrapes the sides of the thermal bowl while aerating the ice cream for a fast and creamy result.The Freeze and Mix works only with the BEM800XL/A and newer Scraper Mixer Pro and is not suitable for use with any other mixers.
ls-product.specification: 2 Quarts. Splash guard included. Dishwasher safe splashguard and paddle, hand wash bowl.

ls-product.title: Citrus Press Pro
ls-product.description: Innovative, patented Quadra-Fin™ cone maximizes extraction of all citrus fruits, from limes to grapefruits. Makes juicing easy with innovative active-arm press – a power-assisted lever that makes it effortless to press fruits.Acid-resistant die-cast cone ensures a lifetime of fresh citrus.
ls-product.specification: Drip stop juice spout. A stainless steel ﬁlter for pulp control. Solid die-cast base, soft grip handle. On/Off button with silent motor. Removable parts are dishwasher safe. Cord stoage under the appliance.

ls-product.title: Juicer 1200 Watt and Blender 750 Watt Combo
ls-product.description: We combined the power and functionality of a blender and a juicer into one impressive machine. Introducing the new Juice and Blend — blended drinks with 100% fresh juice. Sharing a single motorized base with unparalleled performance, the juicer head processes harder fruits and vegetables and the blender jug mixes up softer ones to create naturally thick and creamy smoothies, soups, and dips.
ls-product.specification: Juicer: 1200 watts. 5 variable speeds. 3'' wide feed chute. Stainless steel filter basket. Blender: 750 watts. 1.5L borosilicate jar. Hemisphere blades. Included Accessories: 40oz (1.2L) juice jug with froth separator. Cleaning brush with pulp cleaning spatula. Blade removal tool.

ls-product.title: Juice Fountain Compact 700 Watt Juicer
ls-product.description: Compact design packed with power. Collects pulp within the footprint of the unit to conserve counter space. Delivers all the power and performance you'd expect from a Breville juicer. The 700 watt motor spins the filter basket at 14,000 RPM to extract 8 oz (250 ml) of juice in a mere 5 seconds.

ls-product.title: Juice Fountain Duo 1200 Watt Juicer
ls-product.description: Juice and purée in one machine. This commercial-quality juicer has a second disc that purées soft fruits for 100% fruit smoothies. Gets the most juice out of a wide variety of fruits and vegetables, from delicate berries to crisp apples.
ls-product.specification: 1200 watt motor. 5 variable speeds. 13,000 RPM. Extra wide 3" feed chute. Easy clean design. Heavy duty die cast. Included : Micro mesh titanium reinforced cutting disc filter. Pulp container. Pitcher. Cleaning brush/tool.

ls-product.title: Juice Fountain 1000 Watt Juicer Elite
ls-product.description: Commercial performance. Home kitchen convenience. Over 40,000 filtering pores ensure smooth and delicious refreshment. ls-product.title: Juice Fountain Multi-Speed 900 Watt Juicer
ls-product.description: Smart juicer that adjusts speeds to maximize juice and minimize waste. 5 speeds from 6500 to 12500 RPM for efficient juice output. Easy-to-clean micromesh filter keeps the fibers out and the juice in. Beautiful stainless steel. Components are dishwasher-safe.

ls-product.title: The Second Bowl Mixing Bowl
ls-product.description: The Second Bowl is a small (4qt) stainless steel mixing bowl that works perfectly with the attachments to your Breville mixer.The dual side handles make it easy to handle -- and even easier to pour ingredients. The bowl was designed not only to save your cakes, but to save on space as well, as the bowl fits snugly into the large bowl.
ls-product.specification: 4 Quarts. For use with the Breville Scraper Mixer Pro BEM800XL mixer only.

ls-product.title: The Smart Scoop Ice Cream Maker
ls-product.description: The Smart Scoop is Breville's easy to use ice cream maker with automatic hardness settings. It's the first ice cream maker that automatically senses the hardness of the mixture based on your selection and keeps it ready until it's time to serve.
ls-product.specification: 1.5 quart (1L) bowl capacity. Automatic and manual. Nonstick surface. Included: Removable bowl. Removable paddle. Cleaning brush.

ls-product.title: The Handy Mix Digital Mixer
ls-product.description: With so many recipes suggesting mixing times, we've added a timer to this hand mixer. It allows you to accurately track your mixing time for precise results. And with a strong 200W motor, 16 speeds plus turbo boost, beaters, whisk and dough hooks, it has the versatility to handle all your mixing tasks.
ls-product.specification: Twin Beater Action. 16 speeds for light mixing to high-speed whipping. Backlit LCD with timer function. Soft touch finish. 5 foot extra-long cord. Non-tip heel rest. 200 Watts. Includes: Two flat beaters. One wire whisk. Two dough hook attachments.

ls-product.title: The Scraper Whisk Mixing Bowl
ls-product.description: Sometimes air is the most important ingredient. Make lighter, fluffier cakes and meringues without scraping the bowl. The Scraper Whisk is suitable for use with all BEM800XL models.
ls-product.specification: 3qt mixing bowl with scraper whisk. Scraper whisk with detachable whisk and splash guard.

ls-product.title: Breville Sous Chef 1200 Watt Food Processor
ls-product.description: The extra-wide feed chute cuts longer slices and makes processing faster and easier. Gone are the days of having to chop potatoes into little pieces to fit into the chute. The variable slicing disc has 24 settings so you can customize the thickness of your slices from a paper thin 0.3mm all the way up to a thick 8.0mm. Using the 'S' blade, cut through the toughest jobs in seconds in the extra large 16-cup (3.8L) bowl. Or, for finer chopping tasks, the mini processing bowl is the perfect size for small quantities. All backed by a heavy duty 1200 watt induction motor with a 25-year motor guarantee.
ls-product.specification: 1200 watt motor. 16 cup working bowl. 2 1/2 cup mini processing bowl. 5.5" super wide feed shute. Motor overload protection. Included : Adjustable slicing disc (24 settings from .3mm to 8 mm thickness). Julienne disc. French fry disc. Whisking disc. Reversible shredding disc. Microserrated universal S Blade. Dough blade. Mini blade.

ls-product.title: Die-Cast Hemisphere 1000 Watt Blender
ls-product.description: The 3-speed, Hemisphere™ Bowl/Blade System cuts right through all kitchen tasks. Blends and chops with engineered efficiency and uniformity. Makes delightfully aerated smoothies. Auto pulsing Ice setting chips ice to the perfect size for drinks. The heavy-duty, dishwasher safe jug rests elegantly on the die-cast base, adding a stylish touch to any kitchen.
ls-product.specification: 1000 watt motor. 3 functions: Blend, Auto Pulse (Ice-Crush), Smoothie. 4 serrated blades. 2 sweeping smooth blades. 2 litre polycarbonate jug. Easy Assist Lid™. Inner measuring cap. Heavy duty die cast. Brushed stainless steel base.

ls-product.title: Hemisphere Control 750 Watt Blender
ls-product.description: The Hemisphere™ Control is a 750W blender with LCD timer, pre-programmed Ice Crush and Smoothie settings, which automatically alters speeds to improve blending results. The illuminated 5 speed control buttons plus pulse insure RPM speed is maintained for consistent results every time and is designed for even blending performance. It combines the functionality of a powerful blender with some food processing tasks for versatility and convenience. It also features a large 48 ounce BPA Free Eastman Tritan™ copolyester jug fitted with a permanent Hemisphere™ Blade and Bowl System.
ls-product.specification: 750 watt motor. 5 speeds. 3 functions: Ice Crush, Pulse, Smoothie. 4 serrated blades. 2 sweeping smooth blades. 1.5 litre copolyester round Eastman Tritan™ jug. Integrated measuring cap. Breville Assist Lid™. Die cast metal base.

ls-product.title: Hemisphere Mini 600 Watt Blender
ls-product.description: The Hemisphere Mini is a 600W blender with variable speed control and is designed for even blending performance. It combines the functionality of a powerful blender with some food processing tasks for versatility and convenience. The blade design and high torque motor delivers quiet and efficient blending performance, while the contoured bowl design minimizes food traps and makes for easy cleaning.
ls-product.specification: 600 watt motor. Variable speeds with 12 settings. 4 serrated stainless steel blades. 1.6 litre borosilicate jar. Inner measuring cap. Plastic with aluminum. Cord storage. Overload protection.

ls-product.title: Hemisphere Smooth 600 Watt Blender
ls-product.description: Ultimate Blade System plus 4 Speeds and a one touch smoothie function. With 4 speed settings and a 1.5 litre BPA-Free Triton jug, it's simple and fuss free to utilise the benefits of Hemisphere blade and bowl technology. Smoothies are creamier, pesto is smoother, and ice is turned into snow. It can even chop nuts, and make cream, dips and mayonnaise.
ls-product.specification: Electronic 4 speed control plus pulse. Surgical grade serrated stainless steel blades. lluminated buttons. Quiet operation. Cord storage. Inner measuring cup built into lid for adding ingredients while blending. BPA-free Triton jug. 110 - 120 Volts.

ls-product.title: IKON Hemisphere Blender
ls-product.description: This brilliant blender is the top chopper with a slender profile perfect for tight spaces. The unique, innovative design places the blades right up against the bowl, eliminating dead zones and ensuring 100% chopping coverage.

ls-product.title: Juice Fountain Plus 850 Watt Juicer
ls-product.description: This powerful 850-watt juicer lets you choose between two speeds to accomodate different types of fruits and vegetables. It features a stainless steel micro mesh filter which extracts maximum juice. Plus, its heavy duty professional die cast stainless steel body and parts are dishwasher safe for easy cleaning.

ls-product.title: The Boss Blender
ls-product.description: The Boss features a high velocity ProKinetix® blade and bowl system that pulverizes virtually any combination of ingredients. Creating up to 50% smaller particles than traditional blending. This super fine texture increases absorption of nutrients and creates a smoother mouth feel that traditional blenders have not been able to achieve.
ls-product.specification: ProKinetix Blade System. 12 Speed System. LCD Display. 2L Jug Capacity.

ls-product.title: The Control Grip Mixer
ls-product.description: A commercially inspired kitchen appliance, offering you the control and all of the tools. Simple soups can often be hard to make, as stick mixers are notoriously clunky to hold and suffer from excessive suction, drawing the mixer to the base of the bowl or pot. The Control Grip™ incorporates an ergonomic trigger grip, which is easily engaged with a very natural hand position. Control is further enhanced with a reduced suction blade and leg design. This model also incorporates a stainless steel shaft, 25oz chopper, 42oz jug, and a whisk attachment. You gain control over your stick mixer, rather than it having control over you.
ls-product.specification: 8" stainless steel shaft blends and purees Non-scratch base on shaft prevents scratches on cookware Ergonomic handle Ice-crushing blades Extra long 6' power cord 280 watts of power Includes : 3-cup chopper 42-oz. measuring/mixing jugÀ Dual-purpose storage lid/anti-slip mat Whisk attachment

ls-product.title: The Scraper Mixer Pro
ls-product.description: Picture a world of baking that doesn't include sticky bowls and spattered batter. What's left? Baking nirvana. With a singular focus on mixing essentials, the Scraper Mixer Pro draws a straight line from your imagination to your taste buds. It's built for baking. Scraper Beater's flexible edge scrapes the sides & bottom of the Stainless Steel bowl clean. Pouring Shield minimizes spattering when mixing and adding ingredients. Smooth sounding 550 watt motor features load sensing Motor Protection Sensors that detect heavy mixtures and maintain precision speed.
ls-product.specification: Solid Die-Cast Metal Construction. Load Sensing Technology with motor Protection. 360 degree beater-to-bowl coverage. 12 Speed Electronic Control. 10 Minute Timer and Auto Shut-Off. Lift Assist Mixer Head. Pouring Siheld. 5 Quart Stainless Steel Bowl. Wire Whip. Scraper / Beater. Flat beater. Dough Hook. 550 watt motor.

ls-product.title: Compact Smart Oven Countertop Oven

Independent heating elements put the power where it's needed most. Elements adjust automatically for each of the eight preset functions to deliver the right cooking temperature at the right time.
ls-product.specification: 1800 watt 0.6 cu ft capacity 4 Quarts Elements with Element IQ™ Three rack positions 8 pre-set programs Temperature 120°F to 450°F Brushed stainless steel housing Fits a 12" pizza Included : 1 enamel baking pan 1 enamel broil rack

ls-product.title: Smart Oven Convection Toaster Oven
ls-product.description: The 1800 watt countertop oven that does the thinking for you. Automatically adjusts the independent heating elements ensuring an exact cooking process. 9 menu functions suggest the ideal temperature and time, and the oven remembers them for the next use. Toasts evenly, makes delicious cookies, bakes perfect pizza, and roasts succulent meat. The convection option speeds your cooking time by as much as 30%.

ls-product.title: The Bit More 2-Slice Toaster
ls-product.description: The Breville 2 Slice Smart Toaster has an internal smart chip that lowers bread into the toasting slots with a single touch and also regulates the toasting time. On the "a bit more" setting bread is automatically lowered for additional toasting time.

ls-product.description: The Bit More 4-slice allows you to adjust the perfect toasting time for different types of bread helping to prevent burnt toast. The lightweight Spirex has a slimmed-down aluminum frame for superior strength and great castability. The smooth double-paddle handle makes for quick retrieves, and the Fluidrive® II gearing offers extra smoothness and increased sensitivity. The Power Roller® reduces line twist from repeated casts and retrieves, while the DynaBalance® rotor eliminates any spinning wobble by counter-balancing the rotor for smooth rotation. The reel boasts the Quick Fire® II bail for fast and easy one-handed casts. A-RB® (Anti-Rust Bearings) are made of stainless steel that has been fortified with the A-RB® process, making them at least 10 times more corrosion- resistant than standard stainless steel ball bearings. The easy maintenance-shielded bearing design allows for easy flushing of debris and lighter viscosity lubrication to reduce friction and allow the bearing to spin faster and smoother. All Tourney Trail rods are built around IM7 100% graphite blanks that have fast tip-sensitive actions.
ls-product.specification: Tourney Trail 6'6" Graphite Rod. ​Shimano Spirex Reel.

ls-product.title: How I Met Your Mother: The Complete Series DVD
ls-product.description: On the night Marshall (Jason Segel), finally got engaged to his long-time girlfriend, Lily (Alyson Hannigan), his best friend Ted (Josh Radnor) realised that he had better get a move on too if he was ever to find true love. At the same party, flanked by his friend, the outspoken and sharp-suited lothario, Barney (Neil Patrick Harris), Ted laid eyes on Robin (Cobie Smulders), and although he thought this was love at first sight, it was never meant to be and so his quest continued… Still confused? Don’t be! How I Met Your Mother is the hilarious story of five friends living in New York City and one man’s journey to find his true love.
ls-product.specification: NTSC. 28 discs. 4576 minutes.

ls-product.title: Proaccurate Waterproof Pocket Thermometer
ls-product.description: Thin, accurate and waterproof, the CDN Procreate waterproof pocket thermometer (DT450X) offers added functionality and convenience for measuring the temperature of food in the kitchen. Featuring CDN's exclusive Quick-Read rapid response, this handy thermometer is the perfect choice for home cooks. Because of its waterproof design, it can withstand moisture and humidity and will continue to work accurately even if accidentally submerged. It is shatterproof and high-heat resistant. - Pocket-sized quick-read thermometer that's great for measuring temp in thin cuts of meat, fish or poultry - Stainless steel stem with thin tip can get a reading in 6-8 seconds - Plastic protective sheath can be used as a handle extension; includes temperature guide - Measurement range of -40 to 450 degrees F (-40 to 230 degrees C) - Powered by LR44 button battery (included).

ls-product.title: Trekking guide Navigator
ls-product.description: The Celestron TrekGuide Digital information center is perfect for hiking and other outdoor activities. The display is large and easy to read under any conditions. The TrekGuide displays a lot of information clearly Time, calendar, altitude, barometric pressure, weather forecast, compass reading, and more.
ls-product.specification: Current time. Calendar. Alarm. Barometer. Altitude. Digital Compass. Bubble level (for the compass). Backlight. Water resistant. Uses 2 CR2032 batteries (included). Includes lanyard.

ls-product.title: 114LCM Computerized Telescope
ls-product.description: Dedicated to unfolding the wonders of the Universe, the 114LCM Telescope from Celestron features an excellent combination of power and portability. With its computer-automated technology, the LCM is up and running after locating 3 bright celestial objects.
ls-product.specification: Proven NexStar computer control technology. High quality 114 mm reflector telescope. Database allows telescope to locate over 4,000 celestial objects. Lightweight Computerized Mount (LCM). Quick-release computerized base, optical tube and accessory tray for quick no tool set up. Flash upgradeable hand control software and motor control units for downloading product updates over the Internet. Sturdy aluminum tripod and accessory tray included. Internal battery compartment to prevent cord wrap during use. Good for terrestrial and celestial observing. Includes CD-ROM "The Sky" Astronomy Software which provides education about the sky and printable sky maps.

ls-product.title: Advanced VX 6" Newtonian Telescope
ls-product.description: For those new to astronomy and astroimaging, the Advanced VX 6” Newtonian is an excellent entry-level setup that can grow with you. The Newtonian optical design is excellent for visual observing and offers you the largest aperture for the price. Combined with our Advanced VX mount, you’ll have all the tools you need to learn the basics of imaging.
ls-product.specification: 6” (150mm) f/5 optical design gives excellent wide field views. Parabolic primary mirror minimizes spherical aberration to produce a better image. Integer gear ratios and permanently programmable Periodic Error Correction eliminates recurring track errors from the worm gear. New motors offer improved tracking performance & provide more power to overcome load imbalances. Updated industrial design offers more rigidity, less flexure and improved aesthetics. New design allows viewing or imaging across the meridian without interference from the motors housings. Improved latitude range, can be used between 7 – 77 degrees latitude. Improved electronics contain increased memory for future expansion. NexStar+ hand control offers multiple language programming (English, French, Italian, German, Spanish).

ls-product.title: AstroMaster 130EQ Telescope
ls-product.description: For those who are looking for large aperture and light gathering capability, the answer may lie with the choice of the Celestron AstroMaster 130 newtonian reflector telescope. Its 5.1" diameter is considered excellent for light collection. When you are looking for faint sky objects such as clusters and nebulae, large aperture becomes relevant. A 650mm f/5 aperture is considered really bright in optical terms, and offers a wide field of view. In order to take full advantage of the telescope's short focal length and wide field of view, the user may consider the purchase of a longer eyepiece than the standard 20mm for viewing galaxies.
ls-product.specification: Quick and easy no-tool setup. Permanently mounted StarPointer Finderscope. Erect Image Optics - Ideal for terrestrial and astronomical use - on both Refractor and Reflector designs. Quick release dovetail attachment for a no-tool setup. German Equatorial Mount with Setting Circles - to accurately locate and track sky objects. Rugged pre-assembled tripod with 1.25-inch steel tube legs - Provides a rigid and stable platform. All coated glass optics for clear, crisp images. Deluxe accessory tray for convenient storage of accessories. "The Sky" Level 1 planetarium software with 10,000 object database and enhanced images.

ls-product.title: AstroMaster 70AZ Telescope
ls-product.description: The Celestron AstroMaster-70 is a very good telescope for beginners. It is ideal for both terrestrial and celestial applications. The AstroMaster-70 offers multi-coated glass optics to allow clear and crisp images. This refractor model can also be used for astrophotography with an appropriate T-Mount adapter. It comes with a rugged pre-assembled tripod, 10mm and 20mm eyepieces and a permanent mounted Starpointer finder scope to easily locate heavenly objects.
ls-product.specification: Quick and easy no-tool setup. Erect Image Optics - Ideal for terrestrial and astronomical use - on both Refractor and Reflector designs. Quick release dovetail attachment for a no-tool setup. Pan handle Alt-Az control with clutch - for smooth and accurate pointing. Rugged pre-assembled tripod with 1.25" steel tube legs - Provides a rigid and stable platform. All coated glass optics for clear, crisp images. Deluxe accessory tray for convenient storage of accessories. "The Sky" Level 1 planetarium software with 10,000 object database and enhanced images.

ls-product.title: AstroMaster 70EQ Telescope
ls-product.description: If you're looking for a dual-purpose telescope appropriate for both terrestrial and celestial viewing, then the AstroMaster Series is for you. Each AstroMaster model is capable of giving correct views of land and sky. The AstroMaster Series produce bright, clear images of the Moon and planets. It is easy to see the moons of Jupiter and the rings of Saturn with every one of these fine instruments. For views of the brighter deep space objects like galaxies and nebulae, we recommend the larger aperture and light gathering ability of the Newtonian reflectors.
ls-product.specification: Quick and easy no-tool setup. Erect Image Optics - Ideal for terrestrial and astronomical use - on both Refractor and Reflector designs. Quick release dovetail attachment for a no-tool setup. German Equatorial Mount with Setting Circles - to accurately locate and track sky objects. Rugged pre-assembled tripod with 1.25" steel tube legs - Provides a rigid and stable platform. All coated glass optics for clear, crisp images. Deluxe accessory tray for convenient storage of accessories. "The Sky" Level 1 planetarium software with 10,000 object database and enhanced images.

ls-product.title: CGE PRO 1400 Computerized Telescope
ls-product.description: The CGE Pro 1400 Schmidt-Cassegrain Telescope is part of Celestron's "Top-of-the-Line" German Equatorial mounted astronomical telescopes. With over three times the light gathering power of an 8" telescope, this observatory-class instrument is Celestron's largest optical system in its class. This model features our premium StarBright XLT coatings.
ls-product.specification: 14" Schmidt-Cassegrain telescope. Celestron premium StarBright XLT coatings. CGE PRO computerized Equatorial mount. Schmidt-Cassegrain mechanism that moves the primary mirror to adjust focus is supported by two pre-loaded ball bearings, minimizing the "mirror flop" typical of bushing focus mechanisms. Heavy duty stainless steel tripod adjustable from 38 - 55". 9x50 finderscope to help accurately find objects. Star diagonal provides more comfortable viewing position when observing objects that are high in the sky.

ls-product.title: Nature DX 10x32 Binoculars
ls-product.description: The 10x32 Nature DX Binocular from Celestron is a weather-sealed optic designed for close to mid-range observations. This lightweight binocular weighs less than 2 lbs and is compact enough to fit in a cargo pocket.

ls-product.title: NexStar 4SE Computerized Telescope
ls-product.description: Featuring Maksutov-Cassegrain optics, the Celestron NexStar 4 SE is an ideal telescope for observing and photographing celestial or terrestrial subjects. With a weight of just 21 lb (9.5 kg) including the tripod, the ultra-portable 4 SE features a precision optical system with 1,325 mm focal length at ƒ13, and is the first Maksutov system from Celestron to feature StarBright XLT multi coatings.
ls-product.specification: Computerized hand control with nearly 40,000-object database and motorized altazimuth mount. Quick-release optical tube for easy no-tool setup. StarBright XLT enhances coatings for maximum light transmission and clarity. Flash-upgradable hand control; update your telescope's software via the Internet. Internal battery compartment to prevent cord wrap during use. Includes NexRemote telescope control software, for advanced control of your telescope via computer. "THE SKY" Planetarium software - with 10,000-object database, printable sky maps, and enhanced images. Includes a camera control feature and shutter release cable that allows you to remotely take a series of exposures using your digital SLR camera. Custom database lists of all the most famous deep-sky objects by name and catalog number. Quick release fork arm mount, optical tube and accessory tray for no-tool setup. Ultra sturdy steel tripod features built-in wedge which allows 4 SE to be used for astrophotography.

ls-product.title: NexStar 5SE Computerized Telescope
ls-product.description: Featuring Schmidt-Cassegrain optics, the Celestron NexStar 5 SE is an ideal telescope for observing and photographing celestial or terrestrial subjects. With a weight of just 27.6 lb (2.5 kg) including the tripod, the portable 5 SE features a precision optical system with 1250 mm focal length at ƒ10, and has a 56% greater light gathering ability than an equivalent 4" model.
ls-product.specification: Computerized hand control with nearly 40,000 object database and motorized altazimuth mount. Quick release optical tube for easy no-tool setup. StarBright XLT enhances coatings for maximum light transmission and clarity. Flash-upgradeable hand control; update your telescope's operating software via the internet. Internal battery compartment to prevent cord wrap during use. Includes NexRemote telescope control software for advanced control of your telescope via computer. "THE SKY" Planetarium software - with 10,000 object database, printable sky maps, and enhanced images.

ls-product.title: NexStar 90SLT Computerized Telescope
ls-product.description: Designed as an affordable computerized 'Go-To' telescope, the NexStar 90SLT telescope from Celestron provides an excellent balance of power, performance, and portability. With its computer-automated technology, the SLT is up and running after locating 3 bright celestial objects.
ls-product.specification: Proven NexStar computer control technology. High quality 90mm Maksutov-Cassegrain. Database allows telescope to locate over 4,000 celestial objects. Fully computerized Altazimuth mount. SkyAlign allows you to align on any three bright celestial objects, making for a fast and easy alignment process. Quick-release fork arm mount, optical tube and accessory tray for quick no tool set up. Flash upgradeable hand control software and motor control units for downloading product updates over the Internet. Sturdy stainless steel tripod and accessory tray included. Internal battery compartment to prevent cord wrap during use. Good for terrestrial and celestial observing. Includes CD-ROM The Sky Astronomy Software which provides education about the sky and printable sky maps.

ls-product.title: Omni XLT 102 Telescope
ls-product.description: The Celestron Omni XLT 102 Telescope, a superior refractor with Celestron's StarBright XLT coatings, is now priced within your reach. The Omni XLT 102's excellent and contrasty images are appealing for observation, and the scope's also ready for some imaging duty too. The Omni XLT 102's focuser is the larger 2" size, to allow you to take advantage of some delicious wide field star viewing should you ever upgrade to an optional 2" diagonal and longer 2" eyepiece.
ls-product.specification: High quality optics start with each lens and(or) mirror being hand selected so only the finest grade of optical glass is used. StarBright XLT coatings provide maximized light transmission. 25 mm multi-coated eyepiece - 20 mm eye relief, 50° FOV. 1.25" star diagonal. CG-4 German Equatorial mount with setting circles and slow motion controls - to accurately locate and track sky objects. Ball bearings in both axis of the mount for smooth performance. Heavy-duty pre-assembled stainless steel tripod featuring 1.75" legs, accessory tray and bubble level. Easy no-tool setup.

ls-product.title: Omni XLT 120 Telescope
ls-product.description: The Celestron Omni XLT 120 Telescope offers even more brightness and aperture than its sibling XLT 102-it is a superb 4.7" refractor for the price, complete with Celestron's StarBright XLT coatings. The Omni XLT 120's excellent and contrasty images are appealing for observation, and the scope's also ready for some imaging duty, too. The focuser is the larger 2" size, to allow you to take advantage of some delicious wide field star viewing should you ever upgrade to an optional 2" diagonal and longer 2" eyepiece.
ls-product.specification: High quality optics start with each lens and(or) mirror being hand selected so only the finest grade of optical glass is used. StarBright XLT coatings provide maximized light transmission. 25 mm multi-coated eyepiece - 20 mm eye relief, 50° FOV. 1.25" star diagonal. CG-4 German Equatorial mount with setting circles and slow motion controls - to accurately locate and track sky objects. Ball bearings in both axis of the mount for smooth performance. Heavy-duty pre-assembled stainless steel tripod featuring 1.75" legs, accessory tray and bubble level. Easy no-tool setup.

ls-product.title: PowerSeeker 114EQ Telescope
ls-product.description: Celestron PowerSeeker 114EQ 45 - 225X Reflector Telescope opens up the wonders of the universe to the aspiring astronomer. Amateur astronomy is a great hobby you can enjoy year-round, and Celestron's PowerSeeker Telescopes are the ideal choice for affordable stargazing enjoyment! PowerSeeker Scopes are quick and easy to set up, even for the novice... no tools required! Their sturdy Equatorial mounts are perfect for tracking objects across the night sky, meaning these Telescopes shine for moon- and planet-watching.
ls-product.specification: Quick and easy no-tool setup. Slow motion controls for smooth tracking. Erect image optics - Ideal for terrestrial and astronomical use. Fully coated glass optical components with high transmission coatings for enhanced image brightness and clarity. 3x Barlow lens triples the magnifying power of each eyepiece. Accessory tray for convenient storage of accessories.

ls-product.title: Travel Scope 70 Portable Telescope
ls-product.description: The Celestron Travel Scope is a quality, easy-to-use medium refractor for use on the go. Its 2.8" objective lens is sufficient for very pleasant use as a spotting scope, and it is combined with a 45° erect image diagonal which is well suited to that purpose. The Travel Scope's also practical as an astronomical scope for lunar, planetary, and wide star field viewing-as a 400mm f/5.7 refractor design, each of these pursuits will be quite pleasurable.
ls-product.specification: All coated glass optical elements for clear, crisp images. Erect image diagonal so that your views are correctly oriented. Smooth functioning altazimuth mount with easy pointing to located objects. Preassembled aluminum full size photographic tripod ensures a stable platform. Quick and easy no-tool set up. The telescope and tripod fit inside the custom backpack for easy traveling and storage.

ls-product.title: Digital Microscope Kit
ls-product.description: The Celestron Model #44320 Microscope Digital Kit is an economical multi-purpose microscope that can be used as a traditional microscope with powers up to 600x, or you can attach the included digital camera to view specimens on your computer. This microscope is ideal for educational environments due to its low cost and simple design.
ls-product.specification: Biological microscope with powers from 40x to 600x. Three prepared slides, rocks and honeybee wing. Zoom eyepiece from 10x to 20x; 4x, 15x, 30x objective lenses. Digital camera with imaging software included on CD-ROM. Top and bottom electric illumination.

ls-product.title: Portable LCD Digital Microscope
ls-product.description: The Celestron LCD Handheld Digital Microscope is a lightweight, portable microscope with a 2.4” color TFT LCD screen. A soft carry pouch is included so you can take it along on all your outdoor adventures.
ls-product.specification: 2.4" color LCD screen. Built-in 3 MP digital camera. 1x to 3.7x optical zoom, up to 54x magnification. 4x digital zoom. 128MB internal flash memory, with SD card slot for added storage up to 16GB. Adjustable LED illumination. USB 2.0 cable for transferring images to your computer. Soft carry pouch.

ls-product.title: Memoir '44 Boardgame

ls-product.specification: For kids 8 years and older. 2 players. 1 double-sided Battlefield board map. 144 Axis and Allies Army Pieces. 36 Obstacles. 44 Terrain Tiles. 60 Command Cards. 9 Summary Cards. 8 Battle Dice. 2 Card Holders. 1 Rules & Scenario Bookle.

ls-product.title: Smallworld Boardgame
ls-product.description: Designed by Philippe Keyaerts as a fantasy follow-up to his award-winning Vinci™, Small World is inhabited by a zany cast of characters such as dwarves, wizards, amazons, giants, orcs and even humans; who use their troops to occupy territory and conquer adjacent lands in order to push the other races off the face of the earth.
ls-product.specification: For kids 8 years and older. 2-5 players. Two double-sided game boards (1 for each of 4 possible player configurations). 14 Fantasy Races with matching banners & tokens. 20 Special Power Badges. A variety of Troll Lairs. 2 Heroes. 1 Dragon. 6 Player Summary Sheets. 1 Reinforcement Die.

ls-product.title: Ticket to Ride Boardgame
ls-product.description: October 2, 1900 - it's 28 years to the day that noted London eccentric, Phileas Fogg accepted and then won a bet that he could travel "Around the World in 80 Days." Now, at the dawn of the century, some old friends have gathered to celebrate Fogg's impetuous and lucrative gamble - and to propose a new wager of their own. The stakes: $1 million in a winner-takes-all competition. The objective: to see the most cities in North America - in just 7 days. Ticket to Ride is a cross-country train adventure game. Players collect train cards that enable them to claim railway routes connecting cities throughout North America. The longer the routes, the more points they earn. Additional points come to those who can fulfill their Destination Tickets by connecting two distant cities, and to the player who builds the longest continuous railway. Ages 8 years and up.
ls-product.specification: 1 Board map of North American train routes. 240 Colored Train Cars. 110 Train Car cards. 30 Destination Tickets. 5 Wooden Scoring Markers. 1 Days of Wonder Online access number. Rules booklet. For 2 to 5 players. English texts.
ls-product.others: 2004 Winner - Game of the Year - Spiel des Jahres. Not suitable for children under three years of age due to the danger of suffocation caused by small parts.

ls-product.title: Ticket to Ride Europe - Boardgame
ls-product.description: The second installment in the best-selling Ticket to Ride series of train adventures, Ticket to Ride Europe takes you into the heart of Europe. In addition to the new board map, Ticket to Ride Europe offers you brand new game play elements including Tunnels, Ferries and Train Stations. It also upgraded you to First-Class accommodations with larger cards, new Train Station game pieces, and a lavishly illustrated game board.
ls-product.specification: For kids 8 years and older. 2-5 players. 1 Board map of Europe's train routes. 225 Colored Train Cars. 144 Illustrated cards. 5 Wooden Scoring Markers. 1 Rules booklet.

The dots on the inside of the lid allow the steam to circulate easily throughout the cooking cycle: meat is tender and vegetables are perfectly cooked.

ls-product.title: Baguette Mould - BLACK
ls-product.description: The new ceramic Baguette Baker from Emile Henry allows you to bake artisanal French baguette in the oven.The Baguette Baker traps steam from the baking bread to create an environment similar to a steam-injected oven. The steam gives the bread a crunchy, golden crust and a chewy interior. A recipe book is included with the product so even a novice baker will be confident in baking bread at home.
ls-product.specification: Turns out three 13" baguette loaves. Suitability: stovetop, oven, broiler, microwave. Dishwasher safe.

ls-product.title: Round Dutch Oven 5.5qt - RED
ls-product.description: Thanks to our innovative Flame ceramic, our stewpots offer all the advantages of cooking in ceramic: slow, even cooking which brings out the flavors of your ingredients. How can you brown the outside of your meat but keep the flesh moist? Choose a round stewpot in which you place your ingredients over a low temperature, covered with the lid which makes sure the condensation circulates inside thanks to the dots underneath. Our range of stewpots is designed for use on all types of stove top (with an induction disk for induction hobs) and in the traditional oven.
ls-product.others: Dishwasher safe and won't lose its color.

ls-product.title: Quiche Dish 1.8L
ls-product.description: Slow, even cooking, that's the secret of a good tart or quiche. Serve your tart, still warm, on the table and cut directly in the dish. It will keep the temperature for the duration of the meal and will not scratch when using metallic utensils.

ls-product.title: 1850 Saucepan 1.3L Induction
