ls-product.title: 10" Tajine 1.5L - BLACK
ls-product.description: This Moroccan-style tajine consists of a round dish with a conical lid. The tall lid traps steam inside and keeps food moist while cooking. The tajine is typically used for preparing and serving stews, such as chicken with olives and preserved lemons, or lamb with prunes and cinnamon. The stew can be started on the stovetop and finished in the oven. When cooking, ceramic diffuses the heat slowly and evenly. This ceramic bakeware can be used in both the oven and microwave, as well as on the stovetop (gas, electric, or halogen).
ls-product.specification: Size: 25cm diameter. Capacity: 1.5L / 1.6qt. Suitability: stovetop, oven, broiler, microwave, freezer, refrigerator. Materials: ceramic, resistant against any source of direct heat.

ls-product.title: 15" Plancha Grill
ls-product.description: Designed for grilling meat, cooking delicate food or for frying summer vegetables, the Emile Henry Plancha Grill can be used in many different ways. The BBQ ceramic will take care of delicate ingredients during cooking and is ideal for cooking small items such as mushrooms, peppers or seafood while preserving that delicious smoked flavour. The sloping surface lets the fat drain off easily, while the high sides avoid it dripping onto the flames. Its large handles are easy to grip for serving directly on the table.

ls-product.title: 1850 Tajine 3.5L Induction

ls-product.title: 36.5cm Pizza Stone - BLACK

The items in our BBQ ceramic range can be used all year round, either in the oven or the microwave, and are easy to clean in the dishwasher.

ls-product.title: Les Secrets d'Émile Bread Cloche Set - BLACK
ls-product.description: The result of 2 years of research, the Bread Cloche will quickly become your best friend. The rounded shape of the cloche is identical to a traditional domed bread oven, to ensure that your bread has the required level of humidity during the cooking process. Our innovative refractory ceramic will enable you to get a nice, thick crust with a firm, light inside. Rediscover the pleasures of making home-baked bread, with original and simple recipes "Les Secrets d'Emile" gives you advice and tips for making your own bread.

The rounded shape of the cloche is identical to a traditional domed bread oven, to ensure that your bread has the required level of humidity during the cooking process. Our innovative refractory ceramic will enable you to get a nice, thick crust with a firm, light inside. Rediscover the pleasures of making home-baked bread, with original and simple recipes "Les Secrets d'Emile" gives you advice and tips for making your own bread.
ls-product.specification: 10" diameter size. Beautiful, natural-looking ceramic bakeware. Durable Smooth glaze coating. Works great on gas flame, electric and halogen cooktops (except induction). Suitable for the freezer, refrigerator, microwave and conventional ovens. Can be used under the broiler. Dishwasher safe. Bundle includes : 1 Bread Cloche. 1 Bread Recipes Book (Bilingual - French and English). 1 Plastic Scrapper.

ls-product.title: Les Secrets d'Emile Foie Gras Set
ls-product.description: Enjoy the rich, buttery, and delicate flavour of foie gras. This set includes a ceramic terrine that allows for the even distribution of heat required for cooking delicate foie gras. This terrine is also perfect for making appetizers, roulades, pâtés, and terrines. The durable ceramic ensures that all the heat produced from the oven is absorbed completely by the dish and then circulated around the contents, ensuring food is cooked evenly throughout. The attractive terrine can go from the oven to the table for a beautiful presentation. At the table the tight-fitting lid helps retain moisture and heat, so contents stay warm, but don't dry out. The set also comes with a ceramic press with an ergonomic knob for easy use and a digital thermometer for measuring temperatures at various stages of preparation of foie gras. A book of 13 recipes is also included.
ls-product.specification: Durable ceramic terrine. Even distribution of heat. Digital thermometer. Book of 13 recipes. Dishwasher safe. Bundle includes : 1 Ceramic Terrine. 1 Foie Gras Recipes Book (Bilingual - French and English). 1 Thermometer. 1 Plastic Press.

ls-product.title: Les Secrets d'Émile Crème Brûlée - 8 piece set
ls-product.description: Made from HR ceramic (High Resistance), our six brightly coloured crème brûlée dishes are the perfect size for cooking this famous dessert and its variants. Les Secrets d'Emile offers you numerous recipes around the theme of crème brûlées and the key to their success.
ls-product.specification: Set includes: 1 Secrets of Emile cook book (Bilingual - French and English) 6 Crème Brûlée Dishes ( 9,5'' dia. each) 1 Blowtorch

ls-product.title: Tajine 3.5L - BLACK
ls-product.description: This Moroccan-style tajine consists of a round dish with a conical lid. The tall lid traps steam inside and keeps food moist while cooking. The tajine is typically used for preparing and serving stews, such as chicken with olives and preserved lemons, or lamb with prunes and cinnamon. The stew can be started on the stovetop and finished in the oven. When cooking, ceramic diffuses the heat slowly and evenly. This ceramic bakeware can be used in both the oven and microwave, as well as on the stovetop (gas, electric, or halogen).
ls-product.specification: Size: 37cm diameter Capacity: 3.5L / 3.7qt Suitability: stovetop, oven, broiler, microwave, freezer, refrigerator Materials: ceramic, resistant against any source of direct heat

ls-product.title: 4-person Copper Canyon Tent
ls-product.description: Stand up and relax in this rugged, cabin-style tent. Ideal for cots, the straight walls maximize interior space to give even the most remote adventure a roomy, comfortable home base. A combination steel/fiberglass frame with clips, pole sleeves, and ring-and-pin assembly deliver fast, easy setup. Large D-style doors provide easy entry and exit. No-See-Um mesh roof provides maximum ventilation and air circulation. Gear lofts provide ample room for storage. Walls, fly and floor are constructed of 75-denier polyester taffeta with a durable 1,200mm waterproof coating for wet-weather comfort. Copper Canyon 4 boast a six-pole design, two large D-style doors, a full mesh roof and a roomy gear loft.
ls-product.specification: StormShied® polyester fly Waterproof, factory-sealed seams Storage pockets and gear loft

ls-product.title: A Game of Thrones 2nd Edition Boardgame
ls-product.description: Based on the best-selling novel series A Song of Ice and Fire by George R. R. Martin, A Game of Thrones: The Board Game Second Edition lets 3-6 players take control of the great houses of Westeros in an epic struggle to claim the Iron Throne. The updated second edition brings a host of enhancements to your A Game of Thrones experience. It incorporates elements from previous expansions, including ports, garrisons, Wildling cards, and Siege engines, while introducing welcome new innovations. Convenient player screens will hide your underhanded dealings from prying eyes, while new Tides of Battle cards convey the uncertainty of war. This, along with updated graphics and a clarified ruleset, means the time has never been better to claim the Iron Throne. Ages 12 years and up.
ls-product.specification: 1 Rulebook and 1 Game Board. 138 Plastic Units. 105 Cards. 6 Player Screens. 266 Tokens and Overlays. For 3 to 6 players. English texts.
ls-product.others: Not suitable for children under three years of age due to the danger of suffocation caused by small parts.

ls-product.title: STAR WARS X-Wing Miniature Game Set
ls-product.description: X-Wing is a tactical ship-to-ship combat game in which players take control of powerful Rebel X-wings and nimble Imperial TIE fighters, facing them against each other in fast-paced space combat. Featuring stunningly detailed and painted miniatures, X-Wing recreates exciting Star Wars space combat throughout its several included scenarios. Select your crew, plan your maneuvers, and complete your mission! The X-Wing starter set includes everything you need to begin your battles, such as scenarios, cards, and fully assembled and painted ships. What's more, X-Wing's quick-to-learn ruleset establishes the foundation for a system that can be expanded with your favorite ships and characters from the Star Wars universe. Also includes two X-Wing Expansion packs and one Tie Fighter Expansion pack. Ages 14 years and up.
ls-product.specification: Includes : 3x X-Wing Miniatures. 3x Tie Fighter Miniatures. Cards. Accessories. Dices. For 2 to 4 players. English texts.
ls-product.others: Not suitable for children under three years of age due to the danger of suffocation caused by small parts.

ls-product.title: Letters from Whitechapel Boardgame
ls-product.description: Letters from Whitechapel is a thematically engrossing board game of deduction and bluffing in which one player takes the role of the infamous Jack the Ripper, while up to five other players are detectives working together to pursue him through Victorian London. After committing his horrible murders, Jack must outmaneuver the detectives in the tangled streets of the Whitechapel District. Meanwhile, the detectives must use clever deduction and their superior numbers to hunt Jack the Ripper down before he can kill again or elude them forever. Ages 14 years and up.
ls-product.specification: 1 Rulebook, Game Board, and Jack Screen. 6 Reference Sheets and 4 Jack's Letter Sheets. 5 Head of the Investigation Tiles and 5 Special Movement Tokens. 16 Wooden Tokens, 12 Wooden Pawns, and 27 Plastic Markers. For 2 to 5 players. English texts.
ls-product.others: Not suitable for children under three years of age due to the danger of suffocation caused by small parts.

ls-product.title: Mansion of Madness Boardgame
ls-product.description: Horrific monsters and spectral presences lurk in manors, crypts, schools, monasteries, and derelict buildings near Arkham, Massachusetts . It’s up to a handful of brave investigators to explore these cursed places and uncover the truth about the living nightmares within.Every game of Mansions of Madness creates an immersive story that, given players’ decisions, can unravel in countless different and exciting ways. Included in the base game are five gripping scenarios, and each one offers a combination of plot choices to take your stories in new directions.
ls-product.specification: 1 rulebook, investigator guide, and keeper guide. 8 investigator figures and 24 monster figures. Over 300 cards. Over 200 tokens and markers. 15 detailed map tiles. Nearly 70 puzzle tiles. 1 ten-sided die.

ls-product.title: Twilight Imperium 3rd Edition Boardgame
ls-product.description: Shipping in a massive (12” x 24”) epic-size box, this new giant-size edition of Twilight Imperium features more than 200 masterfully sculpted oversize plastic miniatures - the typical TI units (Ground Forces, Cruisers, Dreadnaughts, Carriers, Fighters, PDS, and Space Docks) as well as two new units (the massive War Sun, and the Destroyer). TI3 contains new oversize board tiles, more than 400 cards, every known civilization of the Twilight Imperium universe, almost every expansion rule and component ever published for Twilight Imperium, a gorgeous graphical overhaul, and an impressive full-color rules set. Ages 14 years and up.
ls-product.specification: Includes over 200 miniatures. An epic board game of galactic conquest, politics, and trade. For 3 to 6 players. English texts.

ls-product.specification: Tourmaline Ceramic dries the hair evenly and reduces drying time up to 50%. More than just a digital photo frame, Aluratek raises the bar with its new Digital Lifestyle Device (DLD). View hi-resolution pictures, listen to music and watch home videos easily on the 8" TFT true color LCD at 800 x 600 resolution. With the built-in 512MB on-board memory you can also transfer your favorite digital files directly from your computer fast and easy without any software. ls-product.title: Minosharp Water Sharpener
ls-product.description: This manual knife sharpener restores the edge to Japanese-style knives sharpened at the same angle on both sides of the blade. The sharpener features two ceramic wheels: the white wheel is coarse and the pink-coloured wheel completes the medium sharpening process. The two-stage process requires the ceramic wheels to be soaked in water for a few minutes before use, which enables the blade to glide through the wheels with ease. The sharpener is fast, simple to use, and produces excellent results. The plastic handle has a soft, rubber-like grip for comfort.
ls-product.specification: Simple and safe to use with minimal pressure. Coarse and medium ceramic stones. Superfine wheel polishes the knife. Ceramic wheels. Not for use with serrated knives or blades sharpened on only one side of the cutting edge. Ultra durable.

ls-product.title: 2 piece Knife Set
ls-product.description: Global knives are made from the finest materials, utilizing Global's proprietary CROMOVA 18 stainless steel. They are then ice tempered and hardened to Rockwell C56°-58° to hold a razor sharp edge longer than most steel. Global blades also resist rust, stains and corrosion and are backed by a lifetime warranty. Set includes the 20cm G-2 Cook's Knife and the Minosharp 220/GB Knife Sharpener.
ls-product.specification: 20cm Blade. Minosharp knife sharpener. Carefully weighted . CROMOVA 18 stainless steel. Seamless construction. Ice tempered and hardened. Extraordinary sharpness.

ls-product.title: Soundsticks III 2.1 Channel Multimedia Speaker System with Subwoofer
ls-product.description: Praised for its stunning design, the Harman Kardon SoundSticks II speakers and subwoofer system became a milestone in Harman Kardon history when it became part of the permanent collection at New York City's Museum of Modern Art (MoMA). Beyond its eye-catching appeal, SoundSticks III continues to be incredibly capable - with 40 watts of dazzling amplification, a down-firing powered subwoofer, eight full-range transducers and compatibility with all sorts of multimedia devices.
ls-product.specification: 60 watts total power. stereo mini-jack output. Touch volume and mute controls. Subwoofer volume control.

ls-product.title: AVR1710 7.2 Channel A/V Receiver
ls-product.description: The Harman Kardon AVR 1710 has virtually everything that you want in an audio/video receiver. Do you want sheer power? The AVR 1710 has 100 watts per channel. Want a variety of entertainment sources? The receiver includes vTuner Internet radio, DLNA 1.5 and AirPlay for wireless reception of your music and HDMI inputs for DVDs, HDTV, Blu-ray Disc media and video games. How about a system that's easy to use? A mobile app, remote control and intuitive menu system offer sheer simplicity. With all of these features and famously superb Harman Kardon audio, the AVR 1710 offers spectacular entertainment.
ls-product.specification: HDMI with 3D, Audio Return Channel, CEC and Deep Color. 100 watts & a powerful 7.2-channel surround system. Dolby TrueHD and DTS-HD Master Audio decoding. DLNA Certified 1.5 Ethernet connectivity. AirPlay enabled. Front-panel USB port. Control applications for Apple and Android products. Headphone surround mode.

ls-product.title: Aura Wireless Home Speaker System
ls-product.description: The Harman Kardon Aura, a home audio system combining the ultra-modern performance and precision of a hi-fi luxury sound system, also boasts a unique, iconic design. The Aura’s has a sound as rich and rewarding as its appearance with six high- and mid-range transducers plus a built-in subwoofer delivering superior, Omni-directional, 360º sound – while elite features like built-in Bluetooth, Apple AirPlay lossless audio streaming and DLNA introduce you to the convenience and multi-function advantages of complete connectivity.
ls-product.specification: 6 mid- to high-range 1.5” transducers for accurate, omni-directional sound and a 4.5” subwoofer for rich, powerful bass. Custom, stereo-widening DSP audio technology engineered for room-filling, full frequency sound. Built-in Bluetooth feature streams audio from your Bluetooth devices wirelessly. Built-in Apple AirPlay system with easy set-up for your Apple computers, network devices and DLNA for Windows. Customized Harman Kardon remote app allows for easy set-up and added connectivity.

ls-product.title: Esquire Mini Portable Wireless Speaker
ls-product.description: Harman Kardon Esquire Mini is a bold, state-of-the-art solution exceeding the needs of the on-the-go professional. No attention-to-detail has been spared – from the lineup of premium materials utilized by master craftsmanship to the chic urban styling of its sublime, uni-body design. Completely portable and wireless, it provides exceptional sound from its dual, high-performance drivers and enhanced bass port design – for the best quality sound in its category.
ls-product.specification: Advanced craftsmanship redefined elegance and performance in an all-in-one speaker. The ultra-thin speaker to take your music anywhere. Rechargeable battery with 8-hour playtime and USB for charging external devices. Wireless Bluetooth stereo streaming. Versatile, dual-microphone conferencing system with echo and noise cancellation technology.

ls-product.title: SOHO On-Ear Headphones with Android Remote
ls-product.description: The SOHO On-Ear Headphones with Android Remote from Harman Kardon are mini on-ear headphones designed for portability and use with Android devices as well as other mobile devices. They feature 30mm drivers and Neodymium transducers and have a slim, fold-flat design allowing them to be stored in the included slim-line carrying case. The headphones sport a stitched leather and stainless steel finish, and also include an Android 1-button remote and mic, in addition to a straight cable.
ls-product.specification: 30mm Drivers. Neodymium Transducers. Android 1-Button Remote & Mic. Flat, Foldable Design. Stitched Leather/Stainless Steel Finish. Includes Straight Cable. Includes Slim-Line Carrying Case.

ls-product.title: SOHO On-Ear Headphones with Apple Remote
ls-product.description: The SOHO On-Ear Headphones with Apple Remote from Harman Kardon are mini on-ear headphones designed for portability and use with iOS devices such as your iPhone, iPad, and iPod, as well as other mobile devices. They feature 30mm drivers and Neodymium transducers and have a slim, fold-flat design allowing them to be stored in the included slim-line carrying case. The headphones sport a stitched leather and stainless steel finish, and also include an Apple MFi cable with 3-button remote and mic, in addition to a straight cable.
ls-product.specification: 30mm Drivers. Neodymium Transducers. Apple MFi iOS 3-Button Remote & Mic. Flat, Foldable Design. Stitched Leather/Stainless Steel Finish. Includes Straight Cable. Includes Slim-Line Carrying Case.

ls-product.title: Clue Boardgame - BILINGUAL
ls-product.description: Reclusive millionaire Samuel Black’s been murdered in his mansion! Now, it’s up to you to crack the case! Question everything to unravel the mystery. Who did it? Where? And with what weapon? Ransack the mansion for clues, ask cunning detective questions and leave no card unturned. Solve the murder first to win! Fun twist on the classic mystery game features new characters and a two-player version. Ages 8 years and up.
ls-product.specification: Game includes 2-sided gameboard with mansion and boardwalk, yellow murder envelope, Clue sheet notepad, 6 character tokens, 6 weapon tokens, 27 black Clue cards, 3 red bonus cards, 2 dice and instructions. For 3 to 6 players.
ls-product.others: Not suitable for children under four years of age due to the danger of suffocation caused by small parts.

ls-product.title: Monopoly Boardgame - BILINGUAL
ls-product.description: Own it all as a high-flying trader in the fast-paced world of real estate. Tour the city for the hottest properties: sites, stations and utilities are all up for grabs. Invest in houses and hotels, then watch the rent come pouring in! Age 8 years and up.
ls-product.specification: Includes gameboard, 8 tokens, 28 Title Deed cards, 16 Chance cards, 16 Community Chest cards, money pack, 32 houses, 12 hotels, 2 dice and instructions. For 2 to 6 players.

ls-product.title: Risk Legacy Boardgame
ls-product.description: How will you shape your world? In Risk Legacy, every game you play will change every future game. A decision you make in game one could come back to haunt you in game 10. The risks you take in Risk Legacy are not like those in any other board game. You and the other players will shape how your world evolves — its history, cities and even its faction and how they fight. You don't forget past betrayals and neither does the game.
ls-product.specification: 12 First-Game Coins. 5 Major Cities. 5 Fortifications. +1 and -1 Continent Marks. 4 Scar Removal Stickers. 35 Coins. 9 Minor Cities. Resource / Event / Mission Board. 5 Faction Cards. Plastic Faction Units.

ls-product.title: Sero Tablet 8" with Case
ls-product.description: Thinner, lighter and with a larger screen, Hisense Sero 8 Tablet with WiFi is the ideal tablet for work and play. It offers up to four hours of HD video playback and seven hours of web browsing or e-reading. The high-resolution 8-inch tablet delivers super sharp text and plays video in 720p HD. The Hisense Sero 8 Tablet with WiFi comes preloaded with the best of Google apps, so you can browse, watch, share and stay connected wherever you go. Designed for enhanced low frequency response and sound beyond size.

And with its versatile Bluetooth wireless functionality, you can carry the Charge 2 with you anywhere and still listen to music.

This compact radio features dual alarms and LED ambient lights that can be set to gradually brighten in the morning to help you awaken gently. Additionally, the Horizon's two USB ports let you charge your devices on your desk or night-table. The unit features a built-in light sensor that automatically adjusts display brightness to its environment, a large snooze button, a rubberized finish, and a built-in battery system to wake you up during a power outage.

ls-product.title: 10 Bottle Wine Cellar
ls-product.description: Elegant, built-in soft lighting makes this 10 bottle wine cellar the perfect show piece in any kitchen or home bar. The electronic temperature control takes the guesswork out of storage, and makes it easy for you to keep your wines at the perfect temperature.
ls-product.specification: Holds up to 10 bottles. Flush back design. Double tempered glass door. Adjustable temperature control. Advanced heat dissipation system. Quiet, energy-efficient operation. No compressor, no vibration. Features soft-interior lighting with on/off switch.

ls-product.title: 12 Bottle Deluxe Wine Chiller
ls-product.description: The Koolatron 12 Bottle Deluxe Wine Chiller is a great way to store and showcase your wines all in one elegant package. The 12 Bottle Deluxe Wine Chiller features double tempered glass doors, wooden shelves and soft interior lighting. This compact wine chiller uses a thermoelectric cooling unit, eliminating vibrations, which can disturb sediments found in wine.
ls-product.specification: Capacity : 12 bottles (750ml each). Temperature range : 11° to 18°C (51.8° to 65°F). External electronic thermostat. Digital temperature controls. Silent and vibration-free. Five removable wood shelves. Double paned insulated glass door with stainless trim. Thermoelectric cooling. Soft-interior light.

ls-product.title: 18 Bottle Dual Zone Wine Chiller
ls-product.description: This unique 18 bottle wine chiller is a dual zone refrigerated tower. It features separate cooling chambers, which can be set at different temperatures. There is enough room to chill 6 bottles in the upper zone, and another 12 bottles in the lower zone. It's unique design, silent and vibration-free thermoelectric cooling system make's this wine chiller the perfect add on to any kitchen or home bar.
ls-product.specification: 2 door Dual Zone Tower 18 bottle wine chiller. Chills 6 bottles in the upper zone, 12 bottles in the lower zone. Store red and white wines. Full width wire wine racks. Double paned insulated glass doors with silver trim. Soft interior light. Flush Back Design. Temperature Range: 6° to 18°C (42° to 65°F) at 22°C (72°F) ambient temperature.

ls-product.title: 24 Bottle Dual Zone Wine Chiller
ls-product.description: Keep your wine chilled to perfection with the Koolatron 24 bottle, dual zone wine cellar. This unique fridge features dual cooling zones. It features separate cooling chambers, which can be set at different temperatures. There is enough room to chill 10 bottles in the upper zone, and another 14 bottles in the lower zone. The Koolatron 24 bottle wine cellar features a silent and vibration free, thermoelectric cooling system. The removable stainless steel wine racks allow you to customize the cellar and the built-in soft lighting make it a perfect show piece in any kitchen, den, or home bar. This unique wine fridge is perfect for your favourite red or white wines. The electronic temperature control takes the guesswork out of storage, and makes it easy for you to keep your wines at the perfect temperature.
ls-product.specification: Capacity : 24 bottles (750ml each) in total. Dual zone : 8 bottles in upper zone and 16 bottles in lower zone. Upper zone temperature range : 7° to 12°C (45° to 54°F). Lower zone temperature range : 12° to 18°C (54° to 65°F). External electronic thermostat. Digital temperature controls. Silent and vibration-free. Five removable shelves. Double paned insulated glass door with stainless trim. Thermoelectric cooling. Soft-interior light.

ls-product.title: 29 Bottle Dual Wine Cellar
ls-product.description: Keep your wineat the perfect temperature with the Koolatron 29 bottle, dual zone wine cellar. This unique fridge is a dual cooling zones. It features separate cooling chambers, which can be set at different temperatures. There is enough room to chill 10 bottles in the upper zone, and another 19 bottles in the lower zone. The Koolatron 29 bottle wine cellar features compressor based cooling system.
ls-product.specification: Holds up to 29 bottles in 2 zones. 2 zones: top zone holds 10 bottles and bottom zone which holds up to 19 bottles. LED display, Celsius and Fahrenheit switch. Tempered glass doors. Removable shelves & basket. Dark interior with soft interior light. Adjustable leveling feet. Compressor based cooling.

ls-product.title: 8 Bottle Countertop Wine Chiller
ls-product.description: Keep your wine chilled to perfection with the Koolatron eight bottle home wine fridge. This wine chiller holds eight wine bottles, and features a silent and vibration-free thermoelectric cooling system. The removable shelves allow you to customize the chiller and the built-in soft lighting make it a perfect show piece in any kitchen, den, or home bar. This unique wine fridge is perfect for either red or white wine. The electronic temperature control takes the guesswork out of storage, and makes it easy for you to keep your wines at the perfect temperature.
ls-product.specification: Capacity : 8 bottles (750ml each). Temperature range : 6° to 18°C (42° to 65°F). External electronic thermostat. Digital temperature controls. Silent and vibration-free. Four removable shelves. Double paned insulated glass door with stainless trim. Thermoelectric cooling. Soft-interior light.

ls-product.title: Coca-Cola 4L Personnal Refrigerator
ls-product.description: The Koolatron Coca-Cola Personal Refrigerator is the stylish and fun way to keep your drinks cold. The Coca-Cola Personal Cooler looks like a small refrigerator and is perfect for anywhere. The Coca-Cola Personal Refrigerator holds up to six 12 oz. cans of soda or beer. It is able to cool food and drinks to 32° F below ambient temperature using a state-of-the-art thermoelectric module. You also won't have to worry about overheating, since external heat is dissipated by a motorized fan.
ls-product.specification: 4L Capacity : 6 cans (12oz each) or 4 bottles (500ml each). Thermoelectric cooling. Quiet and energy efficient. Cools up to 32F below ambient temperature. Self-locking door handle. 110V

ls-product.title: Coca-Cola Can Refrigerator
ls-product.description: The Koolatron Coca-Cola refrigerator takes the shape of a classic Coca-Cola can, and is a favorite among collectors. It makes a great addition to any offices, dorm room, kitchen, den, or living room. This unique fridge cools up to 40° below the ambient temperature. It features one sliding removable shelf and has a 10 litre (0.14 cu. ft.) capacity, which holds 8 (12 oz) cans or two 2 litres bottles. The self-locking recessed door handle makes it easy to use and access. The Koolatron Coca-Cola Fridge is a unique product for your home, and it comes complete with a 110V home adapter.
ls-product.specification: 10L Capacity : 8 cans (12oz each) or 2 bottles (2L each). Thermoelectric cooling. Quiet and energy efficient. Cools up to 32F below ambient temperature. One sliding removable shelve. Self-locking recess door handle. Comes with a 12V and a 110V adapter.

ls-product.title: Coca-Cola Retro Vending Machine
ls-product.description: Koolatron brings together functionality and fun with the Coca-Cola Retro Vending Machine. The vending machine keeps your beverages cold and dispenses them at the push of a button. The Coca-Cola Retro Vending Machine can hold up to ten 12oz soda cans. The vending machine uses thermoelectric cooling, allowing it to operate silently. A must have for collectors and those looking for a fun way to dispense drinks.
ls-product.specification: 18L Capacity : 10 cans (12oz each). Thermoelectric cooling. Quiet and energy efficient. Cools up to 32F below ambient temperature. Push button vending. Comes with a 12V and a 110V adapter.

ls-product.title: Kool Compact Fridge 4.6 cubic ft
ls-product.description: This 4.6 cu. ft. (130L) Kool Compact Fridge is great for dorm rooms, rec rooms, the office or home bar. It features a stainless steel design, an adjustable thermostat, a flat back design, a reversible door and 2 wire shelves to storage a variety of items.
ls-product.specification: 4.6 cubic ft. (130L) capacity. High quality compressor that requires minimal power. Cooling is quick, efficient and environmentally friendly. Temperature range is between -2°C and 10°C (28°F and 50°F). Adjustable thermostat. Reversible door with magnetic seal. Recessed handle. Flat back design with adjustable feet. Removable shelves.

ls-product.title: 1.5L Preprogrammed Pump Espresso Machine
ls-product.description: Makes a good impression. Designed in Switzerland, this powerful brewer understands the complexities and intensities of espresso, creating a cup that wows the senses every time. A made-in-Italy 19-bar pump guarantees authentic flavor, while convenient features, from a frother function to a heating cup grid to a versatility that preps any time of coffee pod, make this a go-to at your coffee house.
ls-product.specification: Includes double-sided tamper & spoon tool. Electronic controls and automatic stop after 30 minutes. Die-cast aluminum with stainless steel tubing thermoblock system. 50-oz. transparent front-access water tank sliding system. 3 functions include espresso, hot water and frother. Drip tray adjusts for smaller cups. Compatible with ground coffee (1 or 2 cups) and all types of coffee pods. Full-body stainless steel pump.

ls-product.title: 1.7L Stainless Steel Kettle
ls-product.description: An illuminated inside light and a smooth, clean design with a full stainless steel finish gives this stainless steel kettle a sophisticated look. A blue pilot light inside comes on when kettle is operating and a concealed heating element in stainless steel reduces limescale deposits - helping to extend the life of the kettle. ls-product.title: The Settlers and Seafarers of Catan Boardgame Set
ls-product.description: This bundle includes the Settlers of Catan boardgame and its expansion, the Seafarers of Catan. The Settlers of Catan from Mayfair Games is an award-winning strategy game where players collect resources and use them to build roads, settlements and cities on their way to victory. The board itself is variable, making each game a little different from the next. Each round of The Settlers of Catan is intended to keep three or four players ages 10 and above engaged for up to 90 minutes. The Seafarers of Catan lets you control a group of seafaring settlers exploring and taming the uncharted Isles of Catan. Embark on a quest to settle the island, build ships, and chart the nearby waters. Guide your settlers to victory with clever trading, cunning development, and by establishing the most productive sea lanes. Acquire your resources through card play and the luck of the dice. Discover far-off mines and use gold and combinations of resources--grain, wool, ore, brick, and timber -- to develop your ever-expanding empire. Of course, the best strategy and a dash of luck decides who will be the undisputed ruler of the Isles of Catan. Ages 10 years and up.
ls-product.specification: 6 sea frame pieces. 19 terrain hexes. Nine harbor pieces. 18 circular number tokens. 126 game cards. 16 cities. 20 settlements. 60 roads. two dice. 1 Robber. Rules and almanac booklet. Also includes all the expansion tiles and cards of Seafarers. For 3 to 4 players. English texts.
ls-product.others: 1995 Winner - Game of the Year - Spiel des Jahres. Not suitable for children under three years of age due to the danger of suffocation caused by small parts.

Central handle to fold up the stroller and side carrying handle. Full hood with window. 5 point safety harness.

ls-product.description: Children from ages two to four can merely step on the accelerator and haul loads around the yard for hours with this little ride. The rechargeable battery powered tractor operates at 2.25 miles per hour indoors or outside on smooth level grass dirt or paved surface. The tractor's brakes work automatically when a foot is lifted from the accelerator, and the seat adjusts for growing legs.
ls-product.specification: Drive indoors or outside; on dirt or smooth level grass at 2¼ mph. Foot pedal accelerator and automatic brakes. Stake-Side trailer; cargo area 15" x 12" x 8½" tall. 6-volt rechargeable battery and charger included.

ls-product.title: Prestige Duck Decanter, 17cm/6.75",750ml/ 26oz.
ls-product.description: So-named because the decanter silhouette is shaped like a duck. Made of hand-blown glass with shiny pewter neck and handle. Designed to decant young red wines, the tilted shape keeps the air in contact with the wine surface, developing and intensifying its aromas. The design also makes it easier to serve the wine, and minimizes the risk of dripping.
ls-product.specification: Gift boxed.

ls-product.title: Variation Decanter with Aerator, 24cm/9.5",750ml/ 26oz.
ls-product.description: Prior to maturity, a young red wine can be quickly awakened by aerating, forcing a maximum exposure to air. This hand-blown glass aerating set features a unique decanter base shape that allows it to stand upright, or rest tilted on its side enabling greater surface contact between the wine and the air, and allows further aeration if swirled before serving. The wine is poured over a hand-blown, fluted, solid-glass stopper. Fluting forces the wine along the sides of the decanter.
ls-product.specification: Capacity is suitable for a standard 750ml bottle of wine. Gift boxed.

ls-product.title: Ibis Magnum Decanter 33cm/13",1.5l/51oz.
ls-product.description: Made of hand-blown glass with a narrow mouth, this decanter is used to decant white wines, and mature red wines with complex aromas. Users may want to use a decanting funnel with this decanter. Its glass stopper minimizes air exposure.
ls-product.specification: Capacity is appropriate for a magnum 1.5L bottle of wine. Gift boxed.

ls-product.title: 8" Electric Soft Touch Salt & Pepper Mills
ls-product.description: This combo set comes with an electric salt and pepper mill, each measuring 8 inches tall with a soft-touch onyx finish. The 2 stage grinding mechanism is designed to release maximum flavor and aroma by first cracking each peppercorn/salt grain before it is ground. This mechanism is made of case-hardened steel which is specially treated to keep the teeth razor sharp and protect from corrosion. The set includes peppercorns & sea salt, six batteries, collection trays and spare light bulbs.
ls-product.specification: Electric salt and pepper mill combo set. Soft-touch onyx finish. 2-stage grinding mechanism. Made of case-hardened steel. Set includes six batteries, collection trays and spare light bulbs.

ls-product.title: Paris u'Select 18cm/7'' Salt & Pepper Mill Combo - NATURAL

ls-product.title: Paris u'Select 23cm/9'' Pepper Mill - CHOCOLATE
ls-product.description: The Peugeot Paris mill represents the absolute quintessential classic quality mill shape. And so it's no surprise that it's still a best seller that looks stunning in just about every home or professional situation. This pepper mill is nice and tall, beautifully finished in a chocolate color stained beechwood.

ls-product.title: Paris u'Select 23cm/9'' Pepper Mill - BLACK
ls-product.description: The Peugeot Paris mill represents the absolute quintessential classic quality mill shape. ls-product.title: Paris u'Select 23cm/9'' Pepper Mill - RED LACQUER
ls-product.description: The high quality beech wood used in Peugeot mills is grown, harvested, dried, shaped and finished in France. Paris mills are available as either pepper or salt mills (various sizes for each), in a piano-style gloss lacquer finish. For Paris u'Select mills, the grind is adjusted by turning the ring at the bottom of the mill. Turning the ring in one direction makes the grind finer, turning in the other makes it coarser. Once the grind size is set, it will stay in place until the user changes it.

ls-product.title: Mice & Mystics Boardgame
ls-product.description: Mice & Mystics is a cooperative adventure game in which the players work together to save an imperiled kingdom. They will face countless adversaries such as rats, cockroaches, and spiders, and of course the greatest of all horrors: the castle's housecat, Brodie. Mice & Mystics is a boldly innovative game that thrusts players into an ever-changing, interactive environment, and features a rich storyline that the players help create as they play the game. The Cheese System allows players to horde the crumbs of precious cheese they find on their journey, and use it to bolster their mice with grandiose new abilities and overcome seemingly insurmountable odds. Ages 7 years and up.
ls-product.specification: 1 Rule Book. 1 Story Book. 6 Mice Hero Figures. 16 Minion Figures. 1 Story Control board. 8x 2-sided board tiles. 5 Six-sided Action Dice. 10 Cards. Tokens. Markers. For 1 to 6 players. English texts.
ls-product.others: Not suitable for children under three years of age due to the danger of suffocation caused by small parts.

ls-product.title: Planeta D.O.P 500ml Olive Oil with Tondo Indulgent Balsamic Vinegar Bundle
ls-product.description: Planeta D.O.P olive oil: Complex oil with intense notes of green tomato, artichoke and seaweed, enhanced with a hint of citrus as well as exotic wood, fresh herbs and basil aromas. The olive oil adventure began in 1999 when the Planeta family started to bottle what they used to produce for family consumption. Alessio, Francesca and Santi are themselves astonished by the highquality oil, becoming in a short time one of the reference points of extra-virgin olive oil. One of the secrets of the success of this oil, other than the care taken in every stage of its production, is the location of the press in the centre of the olive grove, which eliminates any delay between harvesting and processing. Tondo Indulgent Balsamic Vinegar Equally suited to everyday cooking and gourmet dishes, they are also delicious paired with grilled meat or fish, boiled or grilled vegetables, in salads or drizzled as a garnish on omelettes. A longer aging process and a higher concentration in grape must give these balsamic vinegars a perfectly balanced taste with acidic and sweet flavours.
ls-product.specification: Olive Oil: 500ml ​Balsamic Vinegar: 250ml

ls-product.title: Alhambra Boardgame - Multilingual
ls-product.description: In Granada, one of the most impressive building projects of the Middle Ages has begun: the construction of Alhambra. A palace, fortress, and a small city -- all-in-one Alhambra is made up of the world’s most beautiful gardens, pavilions, chambers and towers.The most prominent builders in all of Europe and Arabia want to demonstrate their skills in building Alhambra. Employ the most talented teams of builders to construct your Alhambra. Hire stonemasons from the north and gardeners from the south, who all want a fair wage and insist on being paid with their native currency. With their help, towers can be constructed, gardens designed, pavilions and mezzanines erected, and manors and royal chambers built. Compete against your opponents to build the greatest and most impressive Alhambra. Ages 8 years and up.
ls-product.specification: Game accessories. Rules booklet. For 2 to 6 players. English and French texts.

ls-product.description: In Kingdom Builder, the players create their own kingdoms by skillfully building their settlements, aiming to earn the most gold at the end of the game. Build an engine to control more tiles, which give access to more abilities -- which help you earn more gold! Each game, players will use a random set of Kingdom Builder cards (3 of the total of 10 cards), special actions (4 of possible 8), and terrain sectors to build the map (4 of 8 tiles), ensuring you won't play the same game twice! Ages 8 years and up.
ls-product.specification: Game accessories. Rules booklet. For 2 to 4 players. English and French texts.

ls-product.title: 4 in 1 Printer, Finepix AX660, 16GB SDHC Card, Case and 8" Digital Frame
ls-product.description: Print wirelessly and share effortlessly with the Samsung Xpress 4-in-1 printer. With advanced NFC technology, Wi-Fi Direct and powerful compatibility, all it takes is a simple tap. Simply Tap your mobile device to the Samsung Xpress C460FW series to print virtually any content. Scan images and send them directly to your mobile device. Share the content on your mobile device instantly via fax. The Fujifilm AX660 makes it easy to take great photos. The AX660 feature a 16MP CCD sensor that captures large, high quality images. Also, a precision Fujinon 5x Optical Zoom Lens brings the action closer, and a bright 2.7" LCD makes shooting and viewing a snap. The AX660 also features the convenience of AA battery operation. More than just a digital photo frame, Aluratek raises the bar with its new Digital Lifestyle Device (DLD). View hi-resolution pictures, listen to music and watch home videos easily on the 8" TFT true color LCD at 800 x 600 resolution. Simply insert your camera or camcorder's SD / SDHC card or an USB drive directly into the frame. Pictures will automatically start in a slideshow mode. With the built-in 512MB on-board memory you can also transfer your favorite digital files directly from your computer fast and easy without any software. With Aluratek's new DLD, share all your digital pictures, videos, and music files. Whether it is at work or at home, let the fun begin!
ls-product.specification: Printer: More Power, Better Productivity. Brilliant Color and Razor-sharp Text and Graphics. Easy Mobile Printing. Wireless for Easy Access. Camera: 16 Megapixels. 5x Optical Zoom. 2.7-inch LCD Screen. 720p HD Movie. Digital Image Stabilization. Black/grey polyurethane case Class 10 SHDC 16GB memory card. Photo Frame: Black frame. Built-in speakers. Photo slideshow. Clock and calendar. Remote. Supported card types: SD / SDHC. Hi-Speed USB 2.0 input. Supports various formats.

Furthermore, its innovative "easy recharge" function offers the ultimate in convenience when it comes to charging and storing your wireless headphones. Enjoy total freedom of sound, stylish design and maximum comfort, all at an affordable price.
ls-product.specification: Open, stereo, supra-aural, wireless headphones. Analytical sound reproduction. Strong bass response. Suitable for all types of modern music and TV applications. Receives reception through walls, ceilings and outdoors.

ls-product.title: RS 175 Digital Wireless Headphone with Bass Boost
ls-product.description: Taking home entertainment to the next level, Sennheiser’s RS 175 offers an impressive range of features in a compact, ergonomic package, so that you can enjoy music and television to the fullest. The Bass Boost and Surround Sound listening modes will allow you to experience your home entertainment system like never before – the former increases the audio bass response while the two virtual surround modes offer a more spatial and livelier stereo sound.
ls-product.specification: Closed, circumaural headphones with excellent digital wireless audio transmission. Exceptional digital audio clarity and transmission range of up to 328ft/100m (line of sight). Enables switching between dynamic bass and virtual surround sound listening modes for situational sound customization. Supports analog and digital audio inputs and allows toggling between the inputs. Intelligently designed controls for maximum ease of use. Multi-purpose transmitter – also functions as ‘easy-charge’ cradle and docking station. Multi-receiver transmission – transmitter supports up to two pairs of headphones simultaneously. Ergonomic design for enhanced wearing comfort.

ls-product.title: HD 429 Closed-back Stereo Headphones with Powerful Bass Response

In addition, these headphones display an innovative and ergonomic, silicone design, providing durability and a comfortable fit, every single time. Their closed circumaural headphone configuration effectively isolate against ambient noise, while the single-sided cable reduces tangling. Stand out and be different with the audio quality you deserve.
ls-product.specification: High-output neodymium magnets. Powerful bass response. Comfortable fit. Single-sided cable.

ls-product.title: Classic Boning/Fillet Knife 15cm
ls-product.description: The Shun Classic Boning/Fillet is adept at these two key kitchen chores. For boning, the narrow, sharp, curved blade gets in close to the bone, making it easy to separate meat from bone. Even fibrous tissue is no match for Shun's extremely sharp edge. It’s perfect for trimming the silver skin from a tenderloin or roast or even making your own cutlets. The narrow blade reduces the drag as you cut against the meat, so cutting is fast and easy. When it comes to filleting fish, the blade's six-inch length is just right to glide through the body of the fish, quickly removing bones and skin. The D-shaped handle provides a secure grip for excellent control.
ls-product.specification: Blade length: 6 in. (15.2 cm). Hand-sharpened 16° double-bevel blade (32° comprehensive). Steel: Proprietary VG-MAX cutting core, 34 layers each side (68 total) stainless Damascus cladding. Handle: ebony PakkaWood.

ls-product.specification: 4 heat-resistant spatulas. 4 XL raclette dishes (non-stick coating). 1 wooden crêpe spreader. 1 recipe booklet. Variable heat control. Reversible non-stick grill/griddle top. 50 watts.

ls-product.title: 8 Person Eiger Raclette with Reversible Cast Iron Grill Plate
ls-product.description: The reversible, enameled cast iron grill / crepe top is excellent for grilling meats and veggies, and is perfect for grilling sandwiches, eggs, bacon, pancakes, and dessert crêpes.
ls-product.specification: 8 heat-resistant spatulas. 8 raclette dishes. reversible cast iron grill/crêpe top. variable heat control. 1200 watts.

ls-product.title: 8 Person Red Raclette with Reversible Cast Iron Grill Plate
ls-product.description: The reversible, enameled cast iron grill / crepe top is excellent for grilling meats and veggies, and is perfect for grilling sandwiches, eggs, bacon, pancakes, and dessert crêpes.
ls-product.specification: 8 heat-resistant spatulas. 8 raclette dishes. reversible cast iron grill/crêpe top. variable heat control. 1200 watts.

ls-product.title: 8 Person Stelvio Raclette Party Grill with Granite Stone
ls-product.description: Entertaining will be relaxing while everyone grills their own food on this stainless steel raclette with an easy care granite stone grill top. Just right for grilling meats, shrimp, and veggies.
ls-product.specification: 8 heat-resistant spatulas. 8 raclette dishes. Granite stone. Variable heat control. 1200 watts.

ls-product.title: AlpenGlow 11 Piece Electric Fondue Set
ls-product.description: Swissmar's AlpenGlow 11-piece electric fondue set is a solid cast iron pot with a soft silicone handle which is ideal for preparing meat, cheese or chocolate fondue. The unique feature of this electric fondue set is the flickering light that gives a soft romantic glow. Another great feature is that both interior ends of the fork handle are threaded allowing the fork shaft to be shortened (for meat fondue) or lengthened (for cheese or chocolate fondue).
ls-product.specification: Cast iron pot w/ soft silicone grip handle. 8 adjustable fondue folks. Stainless steel spatter guard. Unique illuminating rechaud.

ls-product.title: Arosa 11 Piece Stainless Steel Fondue Set
ls-product.description: This beautiful stainless steel multipurpose fondue set has a ceramic insert that acts as a double boiler, so you can use one fondue for 3 different types of fondue - meat, cheese and chocolate.
ls-product.specification: Stainless pot. Spatter guard & rechaud. White ceramic insert. Six fondue forks. Dual function burner.

ls-product.title: Indulgence 8 Piece Fondue Set
ls-product.description: The Indulgence 8-piece chocolate fondue set by Swissmar is multi-functional since you can use the components together or separately (plate with bowl and stand, plate with bowl only, or plate or bowl separately). The set includes a white porcelain plate with 5 defined and sizeable compartments, a 22-ounce porcelain bowl, a black iron stand, four fondue forks and a tea light candle for low heat flame. The plates and bowl are dishwasher, microwave and oven safe.
ls-product.specification: 8 piece chocolate fondue set. White porcelain plate with 5 defined and sizeable compartments. Black iron stand. Four fondue forks. Tea light candle.

ls-product.title: Monte Rosa 9 Piece Ceramic Fondue Set
ls-product.description: Traditional Swiss ceramic fondue pots are ideal for cooking at low heat, the larger pot keeps the temperature from getting too hot and burning the food. This 9 piece ceramic fondue set is made with authentic Swiss clay and has a 2.8 quart capacity. The set includes a 9 inch black ceramic fondue pot, a traditional wrought iron rechaud, six heat resistant 11 inch stainless steel 3 tine fondue forks with dark wood handles and an 8 hole fondue burner. The pot is safe for use on cooktop, in oven, in microwave, and with traditional fondue fuelled burners.
ls-product.specification: 9-piece ceramic fondue set. 9 inch black ceramic fondue pot. 2.8 quart capacity. 6x heat resistant 11 inch stainless steel 3 tine fondue forks. Wrought iron rechaud. Ideal for cooking at low heat. Swiss made.

ls-product.title: Sierra 11 Piece Cast Iron Fondue Set - CHERRY
ls-product.description: Contemporary styled cast iron meat fondue set. Best suited for meat fondues but can be used for cheese or chocolate fondues - just remove the spatter ring. Pot is enameled inside and provides even heat distribution. Can be used on all heat sources - easy to clean.
ls-product.specification: 1.6qt cherry pot. Spatter guard. Rechaud with wood base. Six meat fondue forks. Dual function burner. Gift boxed.

ls-product.title: Mont Blanc 15 Piece Cast Iron Fondue Set - BLUE
ls-product.description: Classy cast iron meat fondue set. Pot is enameled inside and provides even heat distribution. Best suited for meat fondues but can be used for cheese or chocolate fondues - just remove the spatter ring. Can be used on all heat sources - easy to clean.
ls-product.specification: 2qt blue square pot. Spatter guard. Rechaud with wood base. Four black ceramic dipping dishes. Six meat fondue forks. Dual function burner. Gift boxed.

ls-product.title: Lugano 9 Piece Cheese Fondue Set
ls-product.description: This traditional style cast iron cheese fondue set is enameled inside to provide even heat distribution. Can be used on all heat sources.
ls-product.specification: 2qt red pot. Black wrought iron rechaud. Six cheese fondue forks. Dual function burner. Easy to clean. Gift boxed.

ls-product.title: Swivel Raclette Grill
ls-product.description: Hot stone and cast aluminum non-stick grill plate. Black base with stainless steel tray. Versatile usage; unfolds up to 180 degrees. Separate power control for each grill side.
ls-product.specification: 8 non-stick raclette dishes. 8 heat resistant spatulas. 1200W / 120V / 60Hz..

ls-product.title: 60 Nespresso Capsule Storage Unit
ls-product.description: Keep your Nespresso coffee capsules neat, organized, and easily reachable. Turntable-style storage unit allows access from all sides. Light weight aluminum frame; weighted for stability during use.
ls-product.specification: Store up to 60 Nespresso single-serve capsules. Capsules not included.

ls-product.title: Shucker Paddy Universal Oyster Knife
ls-product.description: Ergo-dynamic dual axis pistol grip designe with finger guard. Designed by world renowned shucker Patrick McMurray.
ls-product.specification: 135 degree angle keeps the forearm in alignment with the blade for maximum transfer of power. 3" blade with tapered tip. Perfect for all types of Oysters. With the knife's dual axis lever, uses less force to open oysters. Ambidextrous. DIshwasher safe. Stainless Steel. Injection moulded non-slip PP Handle.

ls-product.title: Stainless Steel Bar Set
ls-product.description: Get all the essentials for stocking your bar in one shot.
ls-product.specification: Set includes: Shaker. Strainer. Bar knife. Double jigger. Stirrer. Tongs to take your mixing abilities to master levels. Made of polished and brushed stainless steel.

ls-product.title: 1500W Garment Steamer
ls-product.description: Steam on Demand! Convenienct and easy to use garment steamer heats up quickly, equipped with a soft insulated hose and includes variable steam settings.
ls-product.specification: Variable steam settings to adjust to fabric options (4 settings). Fast 60 second heat up time. Steam on demand - Easy to use hand operated on/ off control with light indicator. On board storage allows you to never lose the accessories (fabric brush, pant clip, hanger rack). Telescopic pole for easy storage. Safety auto-off function. Large 1.8 L (0.5 gal.) removable water tank, 1 hour worth of steaming. Integrated hanger with rotary movement for easy storage. Durable steam hose with woven fabric. Easy rolling quad wheels for transporting. Powerful 1500 Watts for professional steaming results.

ls-product.title: Ultraglide Diffusion Iron
ls-product.description: Exclusive Ultraglide soleplate with active lines provides superior glide ability and three powerful steam zones for better steam diffusion. Extra wide base for added stability. Anti-scale system ensures a constant flow of steam for a better performance and longer life. 3-way auto-off with blinking light for maximum safety. Vertical steaming removes wrinkles from hanging garments or drapes. Variable steam for flexibility when ironing a variety of fabrics.
ls-product.specification: 0,25g/min continuous variable steam. 55g/min burst of steam. 270ml water tank capacity. Easy cord storage on base. Self cleaning. Easy to read thermostat dial. Temperature ready indicator light. 1400W of power.

ls-product.title: 11 Piece Softline Cookware Set
ls-product.description: Heavy 3 mm gauge body allows for even heat distribution. Expert non-stick interior encourages the use of metal utensils without damage. Non-stick exterior makes cleaning quick and easy. Saucepans are equipped with pouring spouts for effortless pouring. Welded bakelite handles employs pioneering design with soft silicone comfort grip accents.Thermo-Spot™ allows for perfect cooking results.Signature T-Fal Optimal base technology, safe on all cooking surfaces except induction.
ls-product.specification: 10 1/4'' Sauté Pan. 4.7L Jumbo Cooker with Cover. 4.7L Dutch Oven with Cover. 3L Suacepan with Cover. 2.3L Suacepan with Cover. 1.2L Saucepan with Cover.

ls-product.title: Pleasure 9-Piece Cookware Set
ls-product.description: Upgrade your cookware with this 9-piece set from T-Fal. Sturdy and lightweight, it features Expert Pro non-stick coating that is designed to stand up to frequent use. The Heavy 3mm gauge body enables even heat distribution for consistent results, and it is safe to use with metal utensils.
ls-product.specification: Thermo-Spot technology guarantees expert results. Shock-proof enamel exterior is durable and easy to maintain. Ergonomic welded Bakelite handles. Signature T-Fal Optimal Base with thermo-conductive copper speckles. Oven safe up to 175 degrees Celsius/350 degrees Fahrenheit. Dishwasher safe. Includes: 1 x Fry Pan. 2 x Sauce Pan & Lid. Dutch Oven & Lid. Deep Saute & Lid.

ls-product.title: Talent Induction Fry Pans 3-Piece Bundle
ls-product.description: Show off your culinary skills with these T-fal Talent fry pans. Made from sturdy aluminum, these durable pans feature T-fal's revolutionary six-layer Titanium Pro non-stick coating. With high sides, these pans offer tons of room to cook a full meal and guard against splatters. Thermo-Spot technology lets you see when the pan is hot enough, ensuring optimal cooking results.
ls-product.specification: This set includes: 20cm Frypan. 24cm Frypan. 30cm Frypan.

ls-product.title: Jamie Oliver by T-Fal stainless steel frypans - Set of 2
ls-product.description: Jamie Oliver and T-fal have been working together, combining Cookware Jamie’s passion for cooking great food at home with Tefal’s expertise in cookware, to create a hard-wearing everyday range of cookware to give you confidence to get creative in the kitchen. If you want long lasting quality from your kitchenware then look no further than the Tefal Jamie Oliver Stainless Steel Set . Each non-stick pan has a thermo spot with improved technology to give you the most accurate indicator of heat and when you should start cooking for ultimate flavour. The polished stainless steel exterior gives a longer life for your items increasing strength and durability, as well as providing a stylish finish. Each pan has been designed with a flared lip to make pouring drip-free, as well as having a riveted handle with silicon insert that is heat-proof up to 260°C.
ls-product.specification: 1x Frying Pan 20cm. 1x Frying Pan 30cm. Aluminium core in the base to ensure even heat distribution. Stainless Steel for maximum style and extreme durability.

ls-product.title: Pleasure Non-Stick Coating Frying pans - Set of 3
ls-product.description: The T-Fal® Pleasure Frying Pan is long lasting, and built with the superb quality T-Fal products are known for. Available in 3 sizes, you'll fall in love with cooking when you experience the ease of the non-stick coating, and predictability of Thermo-spot technology. 3 sizes: 20cm, 26cm, 30cm.
ls-product.specification: 1x Frying Pan 20cm. 1x Frying Pan 26cm. 1x Frying Pan 30cm. Aluminum base with Thermo-conductive copper speckles. Pro non-stick coating. Technologically advanced. Thermo-spot technology tells you when your pan is perfectly preheated. Designed for use with metal utensils. Can be used on all cooking surfaces, except induction. Dish washer safe.

ls-product.title: Avanté Kettle 1.7L
ls-product.description: Enjoy a comforting hot brew, whether of the coffee, tea or chocolate variety, with the easy-to-use T-fal Avante cordless electric kettle. It offers 1500 watts of power and a 1.7-litre capacity so you can quickly make all types of soothing, energizing or creamy beverages.
ls-product.specification: 1500 watts of power offer quick boiling. 1.7-litre capacity is great for serving hot beverages at parties or intimate gatherings. Two water windows with indicator allow you to easily monitor the boiling process.

ls-product.title: ActiFry
ls-product.description: This innovative technology uses only 1 tablespoon of oil for 1.5 kg (3.3 lb.) of crispy French fries. Perfect for those who want a healthier alternative with the same great taste of fried foods.
ls-product.specification: ActiFry technology is a patented heat pulse system for optimized hot air circulation. Removable cooking pan featuring T-Fal's exclusive ceramic coating. Removable filter. 60 minute timer with indicator beep to let you know when you meals are ready. Audible warning at end of cooking period. Easy-to-use large LCD Screen. 14ml measuring spoon for perfect measurements. Capacity: 1.5 kg. Full colour recipe book with 60 recipes for great meal ideas. 1400 watts of power. Dishwasher safe: spoon, stirring paddle, lid, bowl.

ls-product.title: Actifry Fryer
ls-product.description: The fittest French fry you’ll ever eat has arrived! Prepare 2.2 lbs of crispy French fries with only 1 tbsp of oil. You can also make delicious meat, seafood, vegetable, and fruit dishes with the Actifry. It’s easy to use featuring a transparent lid with an automatic open button to safely and easily monitor food while cooking. It also has a removable cooking pan with safe and scratch resistant ceramic coating for easy cleanup. Additionally, the 60 minute timer with indicator notifies you when meals are ready. It also comes with a full colour recipe book with 32 recipes for great meal ideas.
ls-product.specification: Patented heat pulse system 14 ml measuring spoon Stirring paddle for even cooking Cool touch body Removable filter Dishwasher removable safe lid, stirring paddle and basket 1450 watts 14 ml measuring spoon included.

ls-product.title: Filtra Pro fryer 3L
ls-product.description: Stylish waffle weave design for enhanced durability and reduction of finger prints. Equipped with a patented oil filtering system to strain the oil in one easy step. An adjustable thermostat with temperature indicator light allows for precise control and a convenient 60 min count down timer lets you know when your meal is ready. Convenient viewing window on the lid lets you watch over the cooking process.
ls-product.specification: Family sized capacity ( 3L oil / 2.6 lbs of food) and fryer body, bowl, basket, lid and filtering mesh disassembles for fast and easy clean ups. Detachable cord and 1500 watts of power. • Capacity: 3L oil / 2.6 lbs (1.2 kg) of food • 1500 watts of power • Patented oil filtering system • Waffle weave stainless steel design • Adjustable thermostat • 60min timer • Metallic control panel • Easy clean up: body, enamel bowl, basket, lid and filtering mesh disassembles. • Viewing window.

ls-product.title: OptiGrill Indoor Electric Grill
ls-product.description: The T-Fal OptiGrill will take the guesswork out of grilling! It features three worldwide patents including: automatic cooking applied to a contact grill, a cooking sensor with a thickness measurement, as well as direct visualization of cooking levels. This advanced technology along with a ribbed grilling system and six specialized cooking programs will ensure that all of your meals are grilled to absolute perfection.
ls-product.specification: Cooks evenly on both sides. Cooks from frozen. Automatically senses thickness and regulates temperature. Dishwasher-safe, removable grill plates are easy to clean. Fat drips into extra-large tray for healthier eating. Simple to use with guaranteed results every time.

ls-product.title: Tabletop Raclette
ls-product.description: Enjoy this easy to use raclette with your friends and family. The shape commensurates with most dining room tables. T-fal patented non stick coated interior surface easy to lean and dishwasher safe cooking pan. Large capacity cooking surface is sufficient for 8 people.

ls-product.title: Earforce XP400 Wireless Headset
ls-product.description: The XP400 is a premium wireless gaming headset featuring Dolby Surround Sound and wireless Xbox LIVE chat for a totally immersive experience. The XP400 features a state-of-the-art 2.4/5Ghz dual-band Wi-Fi radio that virtually eliminates wireless interference with other devices. Its dual-pairing Bluetooth technology lets you chat wirelessly on Xbox 360 or PS3™ and answer cell phone calls - all while gaming in amazing 360-degree wireless surround sound. Powered by a rechargeable battery, the XP400 provides up to 15 hours of play and the ability to recharge while gaming so you'll never miss out on the action. The XP400 also comes equipped with multiple EQ presets and adjustable surround sound angles, allowing you to customize the audio for different gaming scenarios. Massive 50mm speakers with acoustically tuned ear cups and breathable mesh ear cushions deliver the ultimate in audio fidelity and extreme comfort.
ls-product.specification: Compatible with Xbox One, Xbox 360, PS3 and PC. Rechargeable Battery. Dual-pairing Bluetooth. Dolby Surround Sound.

Glass bowl is removable for cleaning.

Buds along stem provide 12 spots for hanging; leaf-shaped dish at base holds rings. Design: Anne Charbonneau. measures 15 by 9 by 5-1/2-Inch overall

ls-product.title: Black Dress Shoe Organizer
ls-product.description: The Black Dress over-the-door shoe organizer by Umbra is a smart and stylish storage solution for any fashionista. Constructed of polyester fabric with a mesh front panel and metal hooks, it hangs over any standard door and offers 22 storage compartments of varying sizes. The mesh front allows instant visibility to contents. The pockets at the top can also hold small handbags or accessories. Measures 66-inch by 17-inch by 8-inch. Designed by Matt Carr for Umbra - the worldwide leader in innovative, casual, modern and affordable design for the home.
ls-product.specification: Design: Matt Carr. Measures 66-inch by 17-inch by 8-inch

The waistband strap unfastens to loop in bracelets. The included wooden hanger rotates 360 degrees for access on both sides, can be used in the closet or hung over the door using a hook. The Couture Jewelry Organizer is constructed of polyester with a satin finish and mesh pockets, the dress comes in a satin bag for elegant gift giving. ls-product.title: Take 5 Wall Clock - BLACK
ls-product.description: The inspiration for the Take 5 wall clock by Umbra is quite obvious: for many people, five o'clock is the most important time of the day. The enlarged five marks quittin' time, playing off the humor of the dreaded "9-to-5 job" and adding some levity to the daily grind. Faceless, lens-less and otherwise number-less, Take 5 is designed to be an art statement with a sense of humor, yet still modern and sophisticated to fit any space. Constructed of black molded plastic, this clock measures 20-1/2-inch in diameter by 1-1/2-inch deep and operates on one AA battery (not included). It also offers an impressive lineup of special features designed to provide you with many time-saving conveniences and enhance your overall entertainment experience.

ls-product.title: Essential White Wine Aerator
ls-product.description: Bernoulli's Principle states that as the speed of a moving fluid increases, the pressure within the fluid decreases. This is dictated by the law of conservation of energy. When wine is poured in the Vinturi, its internal design creates an increase in the wine's velocity and a decrease in its pressure. This pressure difference draws in air which is mixed with wine for perfect aeration. Better bouquet. Enhanced flavors. Smoother finish.
ls-product.specification: Exclusively for white wine. Made of acrylic. Dishwasher safe.
